Jour\u00adnal of Travel Research (51), 768-778.; http:\/\/estudiosgeograficos.revistas.csic.es\/index.php\/estudiosgeograficos\/article\/view\/779; doi:10.3989\/estgeogr.202056.056","identifier":"http:\/\/estudiosgeograficos.revistas.csic.es\/index.php\/estudiosgeograficos\/article\/view\/779; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.3989\/estgeogr.202056.056","title":"The \u201cnetwork\u201d protocol applied to the study of tourist destinations: the case of Gijon (Spain) ; El protocolo \u201cnetwork\u201d aplicado al estudio de los destinos tur\u00edsticos: el caso de Gij\u00f3n (Espa\u00f1a)","paper_abstract":"The definition of the concept of destination is a very complicated matter, given the need for consensus between different types of academics and professionals. However, it is essential to establish an adequate framework of knowledge for planning and managing tourism. Most of the new proposals revolve around the Network perspective, with intra and interrelation\u00adships between agents, attractions and tourist services, and even destinations. The \u201csecond generation\u201d experience factor, support\u00aded by the phenomenon of co-creation, is currently considered the leitmotif for tourists. According to this concept, it is the tourists who, with the choices of resources and services, and with their movements in the territories, really define a destination as such, and in its different facets. This work uses the well-known SmartMax game to offer an empirical protocol of knowledge, quantitative and qualitative, of a tourist destination. Relying on data on the mobility of tourists, and using multivariable analysis techniques, it is possible to identify the different profiles of geographic space as a tourist destination, as well as the relative weight of each one: single destination, headquarters, a destination of circuit and hiking destination. In this way, a useful methodology is built for the empirical knowledge of tourist destinations, in general, and even for its application in other areas of geographic marketing, in particular. ; La definici\u00f3n del concepto de destino es un asunto muy complejo, dada la necesidad de consenso entre distintos tipos de acad\u00e9micos y de profesionales, pero muy necesaria para poder establecer un marco adecuado de conocimiento orientado a la planificaci\u00f3n y a la gesti\u00f3n del turismo. La mayor\u00eda de las nuevas propuestas giran en torno a la perspectiva de Red (Network), con intra e interrelaciones entre agentes, atracciones y servicios tur\u00edsticos, e incluso destinos. El factor experiencia de \u201csegunda generaci\u00f3n\u201d, apoyado en el fen\u00f3meno de la co-creaci\u00f3n, es actualmente considerado el leit motiv para el turista. De acuerdo a tal concepto son los turistas quienes, con las elecciones de recursos y servicios, y con sus movimientos en los territorios, definen realmente un destino como tal, y en sus diferentes facetas. Este trabajo recurre al uso del conocido juego del SmartMax para ofrecer un protocolo emp\u00edrico de conocimiento, cuantitativo y cualitativo, de un destino tur\u00edstico. Apoy\u00e1ndose en datos sobre la movilidad de los turistas, y mediante t\u00e9cnicas de an\u00e1lisis multivariable, se consigue identificar los diferentes perfiles de un espacio geogr\u00e1fico como destino tur\u00edstico, as\u00ed como el peso relativo de cada uno de ellos: destino \u00fanico, sede central, destino de circuito y destino de excursionismo. De esta forma se construye una metodolog\u00eda \u00fatil para el conocimiento emp\u00edrico de los destinos tur\u00eds\u00adticos, de forma general, e incluso para su aplicaci\u00f3n en otros \u00e1mbitos del marketing geogr\u00e1fico, en particular.","published_in":"Estudios Geogr\u00e1ficos; Vol 81, No 288 (2020); e041 ; 1988-8546 ; 0014-1496 ; 10.3989\/egeogr.2020.i288","year":"2020-06-30","subject_orig":"Tourism destinations; Co-creation; Touristic Flows; Tourist Statistics; Tourism maps; Tourism Products; Destinos tur\u00edsticos; Co-creaci\u00f3n; Flujos tur\u00edsticos; Estad\u00edsticas tur\u00edsticas; Mapas tur\u00edsticos; Productos tur\u00edsticos","subject":"Tourism destinations; Co-creation; Touristic Flows; Tourist Statistics; Tourism maps; Tourism Products; Destinos tur\u00edsticos; Co-creaci\u00f3n; Flujos tur\u00edsticos; Estad\u00edsticas tur\u00edsticas; Mapas tur\u00edsticos; Productos tur\u00edsticos","authors":"de la Ballina Ballina, Francisco Javier","link":"http:\/\/estudiosgeograficos.revistas.csic.es\/index.php\/estudiosgeograficos\/article\/view\/779","oa_state":"1","url":"9d5d103e2d3fa4c4f62ec3237f4716899cea6aac1e7ba2cecbe84c65c33fa3eb","relevance":44},{"id":"151000b86f96ad14ea643f7386c69ab3104774781e48e07fdd7b6422f934887d","relation":"https:\/\/hrcak.srce.hr\/236219","identifier":"https:\/\/hrcak.srce.hr\/236219; https:\/\/hrcak.srce.hr\/file\/343189","title":"BLOGGERS AND INFLUENCERS - THE PHENOMENON OF DRIVING CONSUMER FASHION CHOICES ; BLOGERI I INFLUENCERI, FENOMENI UTJECAJA NA POTRO\u0160A\u010cE MODNIH ODJEVNIH PROIZVODA","paper_abstract":"Social networking has become an integral part of everyday life of today\u2019s modern consumer. Social media are used for sending messages and sharing product-related information, experiences, and recommendations with virtual friends. The dramatic increase in social media use has posed a major challenge to the fashion industry, prompting it to adapt its communication and content to social media users. Content posted on social networks caters for the needs of consumers and provides both them and businesses with benefits of social media marketing campaigns. A variety of criteria are used to measure the success of marketing efforts on social media platforms, such as fashion influencer tags, audience engagement, and the percentage of discussions related to fashion. The fashion industry, which once struggled to reach its target market, is now achieving it much more easily and faster thanks to social networking. In today's digital landscape, communication is more important than ever. Social media influencers have become a worthy extension of the marketing department; their authority is unquestionable, and their reach and impact are greater than that of any traditional advertising method. The fashion industry sees the influencer as an archetypal consumer, a persona who embodies the real consumer and whose characteristics it considers when creating a trend, a fashion product, and eventually the marketing campaign itself. The paper aims to identify the role of influencers in the fashion industry and examine the extent to which they affect\/ consumer purchase decisions. ; Dru\u0161tvene mre\u017ee postale su neizostavan dio svakodnevnog \u017eivota dana\u0161njeg suvremenog potro\u0161a\u010da. Potro\u0161a\u010di prenose poruke, pri\u010daju o proizvodima i iskustvima i daju preporuke svojim \u201evirtualnim\u201c prijateljima o proizvodima koji im se svi\u0111aju. Modnoj industriji dru\u0161tvene mre\u017ee postale su u kratkom roku temeljni komunikacijski izazov i sadr\u017eaj koji je plasiran na dru\u0161tvenoj mre\u017ei prilago\u0111en je korisniku. Sukladno navedenom, sadr\u017eaj na dru\u0161tvenim mre\u017eama je na sjeci\u0161tu je stvarnih potreba potro\u0161a\u010da i benefita koji potro\u0161a\u010di imaju od kampanja na dru\u0161tvenim mre\u017eama. Marketin\u0161ke platforme dru\u0161tvenih mre\u017ea vode se sa razli\u010ditim kriterijima poput tagova modnih Influencera, uklju\u010denost publike te postotku razgovora o modi. Industrija mode koja je neko\u0107 s te\u0161ko\u0107om dolazila do ciljanog potro\u0161a\u010da, danas zahvaljuju\u0107i dru\u0161tvenim mre\u017eama dolaze lak\u0161e i br\u017ee. U vremenu totalne komunikacije, ali i zagu\u0161enja komunikacijskih kanala, influenceri postaju po\u017eeljna ekstenzija i njihov je autoritet neupitan, a utjecaj ve\u0107i i od najbolje reklame. Industrija mode Influencere do\u017eivljava kao arhetipskog potro\u0161a\u010da kojeg zami\u0161lja kada kreira trend, modni proizvod i u kona\u010dnici samu marketin\u0161ku kampanju. U radu \u0107e se nastojati utvrditi stvarna uloga Influencera u modnoj industriji, te \u0107e se kroz provedeno istra\u017eivanje istra\u017eiti njihova uloga i zna\u010daj pri dono\u0161enju odluke o modnom proizvodu.","published_in":"CroDiM : International Journal of Marketing Science ; ISSN 2584-7236 (Online) ; Volume 3 ; Issue 1","year":"2020","subject_orig":"social networks; consumers; fashion; fashion brands; consumption; influencers; fashion market; communication; information; dru\u0161tvene mre\u017ee; potro\u0161a\u010di; moda; modne marke; potro\u0161nja; influenceri; tr\u017ei\u0161te mode; komunikacija; informacije","subject":"social networks; consumers; fashion; fashion brands; consumption; influencers; fashion market; communication; information; dru\u0161tvene mre\u017ee; potro\u0161a\u010di; moda; modne marke; potro\u0161nja; influenceri; tr\u017ei\u0161te mode; komunikacija; informacije","authors":"Martin\u010devi\u0107, Ela; Vukovi\u0107, Dijana; Hunjet, Anica","link":"https:\/\/hrcak.srce.hr\/236219","oa_state":"1","url":"151000b86f96ad14ea643f7386c69ab3104774781e48e07fdd7b6422f934887d","relevance":43},{"id":"4654fafcfa40ea61d184b1e2373f5a9a07744534c3cf1a951c62c3587dffb8d8","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7428626","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7428626","title":"Ventaja competitiva de los servicios odontol\u00f3gicos privados en Asunci\u00f3n y ciudades del departamento central ; a\u00f1o 2017","paper_abstract":"La herramienta b\u00e1sica que diagnostica la Ventaja Competitiva y descubre los medios para que \u00e9sta mejore es la Cadena de Valor ; la cual presenta Actividades de Valor: primarias y las de apoyo. El Objetivo General de la investigaci\u00f3n es analizar la Ventaja Competitiva de los Servicios Odontol\u00f3gicos Privados en Asunci\u00f3n y ciudades del Departamento Central ; a\u00f1o 2017. La metodolog\u00eda del trabajo de investigaci\u00f3n tiene un enfoque cuantitativo con un dise\u00f1o no experimental de corte transversal y nivel descriptivo. La unidad de an\u00e1lisis estuvo dada por Odont\u00f3logos que prestan sus servicios en el sector privado en Asunci\u00f3n y ciudades del Departamento Central ; el tipo de muestreo fue la probabil\u00edstica y compuesta por 320 Odont\u00f3logos. En cuanto a la t\u00e9cnica de recolecci\u00f3n se utiliz\u00f3 la encuesta con un cuestionario semiestructurado cuyo procesamiento de datos fue a trav\u00e9s del formulario de Google. Inc. Las principales conclusiones fueron: Con respecto a las actividades de la cadena de valor se observa que los Odont\u00f3logos consideran m\u00e1s importante: la calidad en las Operaciones (51 % quienes afirmaron de su relevancia) ; 21% a la calidad de Recursos Humanos ; 13% al Desarrollo Tecnol\u00f3gico ; 8% al Marketing y Ventas y solo 6% al Servicio de Postventa. Para la obtenci\u00f3n de una ventaja competitiva es indispensable que el Servicio Odontol\u00f3gico tenga en cuenta el desarrollo concatenado de las actividades de valor ; para la creaci\u00f3n de una estrategia de diferenciaci\u00f3n.","published_in":"Poblaci\u00f3n y Desarrollo ; ISSN 2076-0531 ; N\u00ba. 50 ; 2020 ; pags. 106-115","year":"2020","subject_orig":"administraci\u00f3n; Diferenciaci\u00f3n; Cadena de valor; Servicios Odontol\u00f3gicos; Actividades de Valor; Ventaja Competitiva","subject":"administraci\u00f3n; Diferenciaci\u00f3n; Cadena de valor; Servicios Odontol\u00f3gicos; Actividades de Valor; Ventaja Competitiva","authors":"Kwan Chung; Chap Kau","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7428626","oa_state":"2","url":"4654fafcfa40ea61d184b1e2373f5a9a07744534c3cf1a951c62c3587dffb8d8","relevance":42},{"id":"6550a52be7fe25c882b38fa879ddbedc5d0de37e82c6208bbd5df03c85256e1b","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7472720; (Revista) ISSN 2576-0971","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7472720","title":"La noci\u00f3n de cadena de producci\u00f3n solidaria desde las experiencias de circuitos cortos de comercializaci\u00f3n","paper_abstract":"Short-circuit marketing strategies are solidarity economic practices that affect the configuration of production chains. The objective of the study is to describe how research on these experiences explains the effect these forms of marketing have on these chains. From two databases specialized in solidarity economy, studies no more than 5 years were selected on successful processes of family and community economy in Latin America. Research is evident that their interest is focused on marketing processes and the immediate benefits they generate, but they do not sufficiently explain the sustainability and scalability of these projects and their impact on production chains of these forms of economics. The notion of production chains is still related to the traditional economy and shows the conceptual distancing of economic alternatives from the classical view of the economy, where the reproduction of capital prevails. The literature consulted still highlights the methodological difficulties involved in identifying and measuring the social, environmental and cultural aggregate values of the social economy in order to give relevance to its impact and to build reference frameworks for the consolidation of different solidarity economic forms. ; Introducci\u00f3n. Las estrategias de circuitos cortos de comercializaci\u00f3n son pr\u00e1cticas econ\u00f3micas solidarias que inciden en la configuraci\u00f3n de las cadenas de producci\u00f3n. Objetivo. El objetivo del estudio es describir c\u00f3mo las investigaciones sobre estas experiencias explican el efecto que tienen estas formas de comercializaci\u00f3n en dichas cadenas. Materiales y m\u00e9todos. A partir de dos bases de datos especializadas en econom\u00eda solidaria se seleccionaron estudios no mayores a 5 a\u00f1os sobre procesos exitosos de econom\u00eda familiar y comunitaria en Latinoam\u00e9rica. Resultados. Se evidencia que las investigaciones centran su inter\u00e9s en los procesos de comercializaci\u00f3n y en los beneficios inmediatos que generan, pero no explican de forma suficiente la sustentabilidad y la escalabilidad de dichos proyectos y su impacto en las cadenas productivas de estas formas de econom\u00eda. Conclusi\u00f3n. La noci\u00f3n de cadenas de producci\u00f3n a\u00fan est\u00e1 relacionada a la econom\u00eda tradicional y muestra el distanciamiento conceptual que supone pensar alternativas econ\u00f3micas desde la mirada cl\u00e1sica de la econom\u00eda, donde prima la reproducci\u00f3n de capital. La literatura consultada evidencia a\u00fan las dificultades metodol\u00f3gicas que supone identificar y medir los valores agregados sociales, ambientales y culturales de la econom\u00eda social para as\u00ed dar relevancia a su impacto y construir marcos de referencia para la consolidaci\u00f3n de diferentes formas econ\u00f3micas solidarias","published_in":"Journal of business and entrepreneurial studies: JBES, ISSN 2576-0971, Vol. 4, N\u00ba. 1 (Enero - Junio), 2020","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Econom\u00eda campesina; circuitos cortos de comercializaci\u00f3n; cadenas productivas solidarias; econom\u00eda solidaria","subject":"Econom\u00eda campesina; circuitos cortos de comercializaci\u00f3n; cadenas productivas solidarias; econom\u00eda solidaria","authors":"Cardona G\u00f3mez, Leonardo","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7472720","oa_state":"2","url":"6550a52be7fe25c882b38fa879ddbedc5d0de37e82c6208bbd5df03c85256e1b","relevance":41},{"id":"833904c197f28a5edd3cd940796e8f07d298ce922eac76e52c1d4fa749c556d1","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475509; (Revista) ISSN 2477-9024","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475509","title":"Influencia de las Redes Sociales en la Rentabilidad de las Empresas: caso: Empresas ecuatorianas de Retail","paper_abstract":"This work aims to analyze the influence level of social networks on business success, it has been developed through two research tools, the first tool consists of an observation chart towards social networks managed by the companies selected as the object study, whose analysis was performed based on four items: activity, community, visibility and interactivity; Regarding the second tool, the use of a Likert scale survey stands out, which has made it possible to know the perception of consumers concerning the use of social networks as an information tool for their purchasing trends. The instruments applied made it possible to determine that management in social networks does not represent a key point about business success, however, of the 5 companies analyzed, less than 50% manage social networks, allowing them to reject the hypothesis proposed, it means, that the management of social networks in a company does not affect significatively on its profits, there is a low frequency of publications in both companies, with higher profits, such as companies with negative profits considered in the study, however, the level of profits considered in both registers, has a significant difference. ; El presente trabajo tiene por objetivo analizar el nivel de influencia de las redes sociales ante el \u00e9xito empresarial, ha sido desarrollado a trav\u00e9s de dos herramientas de investigaci\u00f3n, la primera consiste en un cuadro de observaci\u00f3n hacia las redes sociales gestionadas por las empresas seleccionadas como objeto de estudio, cuyo an\u00e1lisis se realiz\u00f3 en base a cuatro \u00edtems: actividad, comunidad, visibilidad e interactividad; en cuanto a la segunda herramienta, se destaca el uso de una encuesta de escala Likert, que ha permitido conocer la percepci\u00f3n de los consumidores referente al uso de redes sociales como herramienta de informaci\u00f3n para sus tendencias de compra. Los instrumentos aplicados, permitieron determinar que la gesti\u00f3n en redes sociales no representa un punto clave frente al \u00e9xito empresarial, no obstante, de las 5 empresas analizadas, menos del 50% gestiona redes sociales, permitiendo rechazar la hip\u00f3tesis planteada, es decir, que la gesti\u00f3n de redes sociales en una empresa no influye de manera significativa en las utilidades, existe una baja frecuencia de publicaciones tanto en las empresas con mayores utilidades, como en las empresas de utilidades negativas consideradas en el estudio, sin embargo, el nivel de utilidades considerado para ambos listados, posee una diferencia significativa.","published_in":"INNOVA Research Journal, ISSN 2477-9024, null 5, N\u00ba. 2, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: (Mayo-Agosto, 2020)), pags. 219-233","year":"2020","subject_orig":"social network; business; retail; marketing; engagement; redes sociales; empresas; detallista","subject":"social network; business; retail; marketing; engagement; redes sociales; empresas; detallista","authors":"Valarezo Romero, Joselyn Ximena; Cede\u00f1o Rivera, Erick Daniel; Novillo Maldonado, Ernesto Felipe","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475509","oa_state":"2","url":"833904c197f28a5edd3cd940796e8f07d298ce922eac76e52c1d4fa749c556d1","relevance":40},{"id":"1f448a89cad65d3ebea29d47d4561632aa2054bdef6d245bb711162deb351e67","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475480; (Revista) ISSN 2477-9024","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475480","title":"El reciclaje de madera una herramienta para emprender y cuidar el planeta","paper_abstract":"This business management proposal, focuses on the reuse of a product that is normally discarded after being used in the transportation of various accessories, especially appliances, this waste can cause a negative impact on the environment since this material has a decomposition period of many years. The preponderant figures of this project indicate that there is sufficient market to exploit the recycling of pinewood and turn this activity into a business model. The objective of this article is to study how the recycling of pinewood (Pallet) can be seen from a future business perspective. The descriptive research method was used because it allowed to evaluate the characteristics of pine wood and relate it as a potential business to undertake it. A household-directed survey was applied to determine their opinion of the reuse of pinewood in novel products, in addition to resorting to the criteria of different professionals who like to purchase products made with pine, another marketing segment of these products made With recycling can be, furniture and office supplies, ornaments among others. The investigation determined significant results on the need to recycle providing the necessary bases to create businesses in which certain families can benefit. ; Esta propuesta de gesti\u00f3n empresarial, se enfoca en la reutilizaci\u00f3n de un producto que normalmente es desechado luego de ser utilizado en la transportaci\u00f3n de varios accesorios, especialmente de electrodom\u00e9sticos, este desecho puede causar un impacto negativo en el medio ambiente ya que este material tiene un periodo de descomposici\u00f3n de muchos a\u00f1os. Las cifras preponderantes de este proyecto indican que existe mercado suficiente para explotar el reciclaje de madera de pino y convertir esta actividad en un modelo de negocio. El objetivo de este art\u00edculo es estudiar de qu\u00e9 manera el reciclaje de madera de pino (Palet), puede ser visto desde una perspectiva de negocio futuro. Se utiliz\u00f3 el m\u00e9todo de investigaci\u00f3n descriptivo porque permiti\u00f3 evaluar las caracter\u00edsticas de la madera de pino y relacionarla como un potencial negocio para emprenderlo. Se aplic\u00f3 una encuesta direccionada a los hogares para determinar su opini\u00f3n de la reutilizaci\u00f3n de la madera de pino en productos novedosos, adem\u00e1s de recurrir al criterio de diferentes profesionales que les gusta adquirir productos realizados con el pino, otro segmento de comercializaci\u00f3n de estos productos realizados con el reciclaje puede ser, muebles y enseres de oficina, adornos entre otros. La investigaci\u00f3n determin\u00f3 resultados significativos sobre la necesidad de reciclar aportando las bases necesarias para crear negocios en el que ciertas familias puedan beneficiarse.","published_in":"INNOVA Research Journal, ISSN 2477-9024, null 5, N\u00ba. 1, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: (Enero - Abril, 2020)), pags. 150-165","year":"2020","subject_orig":"recycling; waste; wood; business; environment; reciclaje; desechos; madera; negocio; ambiente","subject":"recycling; waste; wood; business; environment; reciclaje; desechos; madera; negocio; ambiente","authors":"Caisa Yucailla, Elias David; Padilla Mart\u00ednez, Mario Patricio; R\u00edos Lara, Geovanny Fabricio","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475480","oa_state":"2","url":"1f448a89cad65d3ebea29d47d4561632aa2054bdef6d245bb711162deb351e67","relevance":39},{"id":"41703fbe514fc1114df64bf55f3de655911b320e83e138c0f8ee23a856f27d25","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475486; (Revista) ISSN 2477-9024","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475486","title":"Introducci\u00f3n de marca de banano org\u00e1nico en el mercado ecuatoriano","paper_abstract":"The purpose of the study is to propose a marketing plan to introduce an organic banana brand. The fruit has a potential for consumption growth. The article focuses on proposing bases for banana associations or companies in terms of product marketing. A cross-sectional methodology was applied, with field work and use of instruments such as surveys, interviews, direct observation. The target audience that has been identified are mostly women between the ages of 20 and 40, with monthly salaries exceeding a unified basic salary, belonging to the upper-middle social class, who take care of their own well-being; aimed at the consumption of healthy foods that contribute to environmental sustainability. Regarding the marketing mix, packaging, labeling, value proposition strategies were formulated; the price was estimated based on the costs of the competition; a short channel is proposed between producer, wholesaler and final customer; The defined advertising media are offline and online, guaranteeing the impact and visibility of the product in the market. ; El objetivo del estudio es proponer un plan de marketing para introducir una marca de banano org\u00e1nico. La fruta tiene un potencial de crecimiento de consumo. El art\u00edculo se centra en proponer bases para las asociaciones o empresas bananeras en cuanto a la comercializaci\u00f3n del producto. Se aplic\u00f3 una metodolog\u00eda de tipo transversal, con trabajo de campo y utilizaci\u00f3n de instrumentos como encuestas, entrevistas, observaci\u00f3n directa. El p\u00fablico objetivo que se ha identificado son mayoritariamente mujeres entre los 20 a 40 a\u00f1os de edad, con remuneraci\u00f3n mensual superior a un salario b\u00e1sico unificado, pertenecientes a la clase social media-alta, que cuidan del bienestar propio; tendientes al consumo de alimentos saludables que contribuyan a la sostenibilidad medioambiental. Con respecto al mix del marketing se formularon estrategias de packaging, etiquetado, propuesta de valor; se estim\u00f3 el precio en base a los costos de la competencia; se propone un canal corto entre productor, mayorista y cliente final; los medios publicitarios definidos son offline y online, garantizando el impacto y visibilidad del producto en el mercado.","published_in":"INNOVA Research Journal, ISSN 2477-9024, null 5, N\u00ba. 1, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: (Enero - Abril, 2020)), pags. 166-183","year":"2020","subject_orig":"environment analysis; organic banana; target; marketing mix; an\u00e1lisis del entorno; banano org\u00e1nico; p\u00fablico objetivo","subject":"environment analysis; organic banana; target; marketing mix; an\u00e1lisis del entorno; banano org\u00e1nico; p\u00fablico objetivo","authors":"Villanueva, V\u00edctor Alexander; A\u00f1azco Correa, Cristhian Daniel; Bonisoli, Lorenzo","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475486","oa_state":"2","url":"41703fbe514fc1114df64bf55f3de655911b320e83e138c0f8ee23a856f27d25","relevance":38},{"id":"fb6df1941d7acc90e15a9361746911e97af8d52117e611f86f4ac48951edc26d","relation":"https:\/\/revistes.ub.edu\/index.php\/der\/article\/view\/30136\/pdf; Achterhuis, H. Journal of Computers in Education, 2(4), 399-420. https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1007\/s40692-015-0036-z; https:\/\/revistes.ub.edu\/index.php\/der\/article\/view\/30136; doi:10.1344\/der.2020.37.240-268","identifier":"https:\/\/revistes.ub.edu\/index.php\/der\/article\/view\/30136; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1344\/der.2020.37.240-268","title":"Hacia una visi\u00f3n contempor\u00e1nea de la Tecnolog\u00eda Educativa","paper_abstract":"El objetivo de este trabajo es someter a debate algunos de los temas clave que definen la investigaci\u00f3n y la pr\u00e1ctica de la Tecnolog\u00eda Educativa acad\u00e9mica (TE) en la actualidad y que explican, en parte, su crisis de identidad. El an\u00e1lisis te\u00f3rico que se presenta centra su atenci\u00f3n en cuatro temas: (1) la necesidad de un concepto m\u00e1s actual y matizado sobre qu\u00e9 es la tecnolog\u00eda; (2) una redefinici\u00f3n del campo de estudio de la Tecnolog\u00eda Educativa basada en la relaci\u00f3n entre tecnolog\u00eda y educaci\u00f3n, ampliando su \u00e1mbito de estudio m\u00e1s all\u00e1 de la dicotom\u00eda tradicional entre dispositivos y dise\u00f1o instruccional; (3) la reconsideraci\u00f3n de sus relaciones con otras disciplinas acad\u00e9micas que le sirven como soportes te\u00f3rico-anal\u00edticos; y, finalmente, (4) el an\u00e1lisis de algunas de las debilidades de la investigaci\u00f3n actual en TE producto de las asunciones epistemol\u00f3gicas dominantes en las \u00faltimas d\u00e9cadas, de las metodolog\u00edas auspiciadas por las publicaciones y del tipo de conocimiento que promueven.","published_in":"Digital Education Review; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.17231\/comsoc.37(2020).2394","title":"\u201cI\u2019m sorry you don\u2019t flag it when you advertise\u201d: audience and commercial content on the Sofia Barbosa YouTube channel ; \u201cTenho pena que n\u00e3o sinalizes quando fazes publicidade\u201d: audi\u00eancia e conte\u00fado comercial no canal Sofia Barbosa no YouTube","paper_abstract":"The main theme of the article is the context of digital microcelebrity experienced by children and adolescents, particularly on social networking sites such as YouTube. The purpose of the study is to understand how young audiences of the popular Portuguese channel Sofia Barbosa on YouTube construct meaning about the commercial content and authenticity that the youtuber presents. The methodology used is qualitative bias and netnography is employed in analysing 1.961 comments made by subscribers on 10 videos posted between January and October 2018. As a means of better understanding the context of the comments we also analysed the visual, verbal and commercial aspects of the videos. The comments demonstrate a perception on the part of followers of closeness and intimacy in relation to Sofia and a strong acceptance of the commercial content promoted by the young woman. However, critical reflections about the marketing practices of the youtuber can at various times be perceived, namely on the lack of transparency in commercial relations; this presents itself as an opportunity to balance a romanticised view that many subscribers have of microcelebrities with a more rational understanding of the industry that sustains them. ; Este artigo trata do contexto da microcelebriza\u00e7\u00e3o digital vivenciado por crian\u00e7as e adolescentes, nomeadamente, em sites de redes sociais como o YouTube. O objetivo do trabalho est\u00e1 em perceber como as jovens audi\u00eancias do popular canal portugu\u00eas Sofia Barbosa, no YouTube, constroem sentidos sobre os conte\u00fados comerciais e a autenticidade que a youtuber apresenta. A metodologia utilizada tem cariz qualitativo e contou com a netnografia para a an\u00e1lise de 1.961 coment\u00e1rios feitos pelos subscritores em 10 v\u00eddeos publicados entre janeiro e outubro de 2018. Como forma de melhor compreender o contexto em que estavam inseridos os coment\u00e1rios, analisamos tamb\u00e9m os aspetos visuais, verbais e comerciais dos v\u00eddeos. Os coment\u00e1rios demonstram uma perce\u00e7\u00e3o de proximidade e intimidade por parte dos seguidores em rela\u00e7\u00e3o \u00e0 Sofia e uma forte aceita\u00e7\u00e3o do conte\u00fado comercial promovido pela jovem. No entanto, percebe-se em v\u00e1rios momentos uma reflexividade cr\u00edtica em rela\u00e7\u00e3o \u00e0s pr\u00e1ticas mercadol\u00f3gicas da youtuber, nomeadamente no que diz respeito \u00e0 falta de transpar\u00eancia nas rela\u00e7\u00f5es comerciais, o que se apresenta como uma oportunidade para equilibrar uma vis\u00e3o romantizada que muitos subscritores t\u00eam das microcelebridades com uma compreens\u00e3o mais racional sobre a ind\u00fastria que os sustenta.","published_in":"Comunica\u00e7\u00e3o e Sociedade; vol. 37 (2020): Crian\u00e7as, jovens e media: perspetivas atuais; 93-107 ; Comunica\u00e7\u00e3o e Sociedade; Vol 37 (2020): Children, youth and media: current perspectives; 93-107 ; 2183-3575 ; 1645-2089","year":"2020-06-29","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Carvalho, Barbara Janiques de; Mar\u00f4po, Lidia","link":"https:\/\/revistacomsoc.pt\/article\/view\/2394","oa_state":"1","url":"2c0c4807047e9613b1d7eff11c6575f9db49c1709f9d88895eba7832cf4b79c1","relevance":36},{"id":"451e578342e2abc9bdf0f89f1919eef1f4093050b3b60fa796583f128a9845fa","relation":"http:\/\/publication.petra.ac.id\/index.php\/manajemen-pemasaran\/article\/view\/10450\/9320; http:\/\/publication.petra.ac.id\/index.php\/manajemen-pemasaran\/article\/view\/10450","identifier":"http:\/\/publication.petra.ac.id\/index.php\/manajemen-pemasaran\/article\/view\/10450","title":"ANALISIS PENGARUH DIGITAL MARKETING TERHADAP BRAND ADVOCACY DENGAN PERCEIVED SERVICE QUALITY DAN CUSTOMER ENGAGEMENT SEBAGAI VARIABEL PERANTARA PADA VIRTUAL HOTEL OPERATOR: OYO HOTEL","paper_abstract":"Salah satu inovasi dalam perkembangan teknologi adalah munculnya VHO (Virtual Hotel Operator). Perkembangan teknologi membuat bisnis VHO harus lebih kreatif dan inovatif dalam memasarkan bisnis mereka untuk dapat bersaing dengan kompetitor. Dari penelitian ini, penulis menemukan bahwa hubungan antara digital marketing terhadap brand advocacy dengan perceived service quality dan customer engagement sebagai variabel perantara pada Virtual Hotel Operator: OYO Hotel menunjukkan bahwa perceived service quality dan customer engagement sebagai variabel perantara mampu untuk membuat pengaruh yang positif terhadap hubungan variabel independen ke variabel dependen. Responden dari penelitian ini adalah generasi Y dan Z yang pernah menggunakan aplikasi OYO Hotel.","published_in":"Jurnal Strategi Pemasaran; Vol 7, No 1 (2020): Jurnal Strategi Pemasaran; 13","year":"2020-07-12","subject_orig":"digital marketing; perceived service quality; customer engagement; brand advocacy","subject":"digital marketing; perceived service quality; customer engagement; brand advocacy","authors":"Sugianto, Kevin Christian","link":"http:\/\/publication.petra.ac.id\/index.php\/manajemen-pemasaran\/article\/view\/10450","oa_state":"1","url":"451e578342e2abc9bdf0f89f1919eef1f4093050b3b60fa796583f128a9845fa","relevance":35},{"id":"c885668776e86896e3f797618d5c6130c90b9a90e8a22189d3463b1acbc6c9ea","relation":"https:\/\/culturacuidados.ua.es\/article\/view\/2020-n56-restraint-and-seclusion-portrayed-via-images-posted-on-twitter-what-are-the-implications-for-healthcare-professionals\/pdf; Allen, T., Cho, E., & Meier, L. Journal of Nursing Administration. https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1097\/00005110-200609000-00008; https:\/\/culturacuidados.ua.es\/article\/view\/2020-n56-restraint-and-seclusion-portrayed-via-images-posted-on-twitter-what-are-the-implications-for-healthcare-professionals; doi:10.14198\/cuid.2020.56.16","identifier":"https:\/\/culturacuidados.ua.es\/article\/view\/2020-n56-restraint-and-seclusion-portrayed-via-images-posted-on-twitter-what-are-the-implications-for-healthcare-professionals; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.14198\/cuid.2020.56.16","title":"Restraint and seclusion portrayed via images posted on Twitter \u2013 what are the implications for healthcare professionals? ; La restricci\u00f3n y el aislamiento mostrados a trav\u00e9s de im\u00e1genes publicadas en Twitter: \u00bfCu\u00e1les son las implicaciones para los profesionales de la salud?","paper_abstract":"Objective: To map areas of discusi\u00f3n about use of seclusion and restraint in healthcare, as expressed in motifs posted on Twitter. Materials and method: We adopted a qualitative approach with an archival and cross-sectional observational design. 188 images from Twitter postings were analyzed. Results: Five categories were identified: Informative and educational messages; Equipment as artifacts; Spatiality; The restrained subjects; Sociopolitical connotations of restraint. Conclusions: Based on our results we conclude that restraint- and seclusion images posted on Twitter included several aspects; the intention to educate others, show the spatiality in relation to restraint, imagining characterized by objects and persons, and a sociopolitical connotation. This in turn means that Twitter posts offer nurses a chance to engage in social marketing and connoting an ethical dimension to a person associated with measures used to exert power over others. This is because communication surrounding certain controversial issues in healthcare is free from hierarchies on Twitter. ; Objetivo: Determinar las \u00e1reas de discusi\u00f3n sobre la aplicaci\u00f3n del aislamiento y restricci\u00f3n en el campo de la salud, teniendo como base los motivos publicados en Twitter. Materiales y m\u00e9todos: En la investigaci\u00f3n se aplic\u00f3 un enfoque cualitativo basado en un dise\u00f1o observacional transversal y de archivo. Se analizaron 188 im\u00e1genes publicadas en Twitter. Resultados: Se identificaron cinco categor\u00edas: mensajes informativos y educativos; los equipos como artefactos; espacialidad; los sujetos a los que se le aplica restricci\u00f3n y connotaciones sociopol\u00edticas sobre la aplicaci\u00f3n de restricci\u00f3n. Conclusiones: Basado en los resultados se concluye que las im\u00e1genes publicadas en Twitter sobre la aplicaci\u00f3n de la restricci\u00f3n y aislamiento, est\u00e1n relacionados con los siguientes aspectos: Educar a otros sobre el tema, mostrar la espacialidad en la aplicaci\u00f3n de la restricci\u00f3n, la percepci\u00f3n que se tiene sobre la restricci\u00f3n seg\u00fan las personas y objetos, y la connotaci\u00f3n sociopol\u00edtica. Esto significa que las publicaciones de Twitter ofrecen a las enfermeras la oportunidad de participar en marketing social y connotar una dimensi\u00f3n \u00e9tica a una persona asociada con medidas utilizadas para ejercer poder sobre los dem\u00e1s, ya que la comunicaci\u00f3n sobre ciertos temas controvertidos en el cuidado de la salud est\u00e1 libre de jerarqu\u00edas en Twitter.","published_in":"Cultura de los cuidados; The use of voice assistants as an interface of interaction with electronic equipment is a new, dynamically developing trend, covering all spheres of human activity. The relevance of the studied problem lies in the fact that the integration of advertising in voice assistants in the near future will affect all types of business in one way to another and become an integral part of a successful advertising campaign: these are the most effective interactive marketing communications of the future. The author\u2019s recommendations on the use of voice assistants in interactive marketing communications have been given. ; \u0420\u0430\u0441\u0441\u043c\u043e\u0442\u0440\u0435\u043d\u043e This fragmentation seems logically tied to the inherent complexity of the Internet, itself resulting from 50 years of evolution. Thus, our aim is to provide an integrative framework for research in digital marketing derived from the historical analysis of the Internet. Using practice theory and institutional theory, we outline a new type of institutional work: imprinting work. We apply this framework to the analysis of historical secondary sources. We find four cultural repertoires on the Internet (collaborative systems, traditional market systems, co-creation systems, and prosumption market systems) and describe the dynamics of imprinting work leading to their creation, showing how new systems are created by appropriating and assimilating existing cultural repertoires. We contribute to the digital marketing literature by providing a cultural framework and a theory explaining the dynamics of the creation of four cultural repertoires. Moreover, we outline three paths of potential evolution of the digital landscape. Our framework may help managers make sense of their digital strategy and navigate the various Internet systems.","published_in":"ISSN: 1094-9968 ; EISSN: 1520-6653 ; Journal of Interactive Marketing ; https:\/\/hal.umontpellier.fr\/hal-02391063 ; Journal of Interactive Marketing, Elsevier, 2020, 49, pp.1-19. ⟨10.1016\/j.intmar.2019.08.002⟩","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Prospective; Cultural framework; Digital marketing; Historical method; Digital cultures; Institutional theory; Practice theory; JEL: M - Business Administration and Business Economics \u2022 Marketing \u2022 Accounting \u2022 Personnel Economics\/M.M3 - Marketing and Advertising\/M.M3.M31 - Marketing; [SHS.GESTION]Humanities and Social Sciences\/Business administration","subject":"Prospective; Cultural framework; Digital marketing; Historical method; Digital cultures; Institutional theory; Practice theory; JEL: M - Business Administration and Business Economics \u2022 Marketing \u2022 Accounting \u2022 Personnel Economics\/M.M3 - Marketing and Advertising\/M.M3.M- Marketing; ","authors":"Busca, Laurent; Bertrandias, Laurent","link":"https:\/\/hal.umontpellier.fr\/hal-02391063","oa_state":"1","url":"e139e98816804dade7376981edb1764e5dc2a4bf70c873b4e14cf97926fdcbef","relevance":32},{"id":"d0329f823a5e6466582fbf1cd0208268fd771c608806bb907c6cb5912c9005d3","relation":"https:\/\/doi.org\/10.12795\/IROCAMM.2020.v02.i03.01; IROCAMM, International Review of Communication and Marketing Mix. 2020, 2(3): 7-21. doi:10.12795\/IROCAMM.2020.v02.i03.01; 2605-0447; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10045\/107908; doi:10.12795\/IROCAMM.2020.v02.i03.01","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10045\/107908; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.12795\/IROCAMM.2020.v02.i03.01","title":"One click away. Towards a proposal of an affective model of media planning ; A falta de un clic. Hacia una propuesta de modelo afectivo en planificaci\u00f3n de medios","paper_abstract":"En el marco de la comunicaci\u00f3n digital, esta investigaci\u00f3n contribuye al debate de la eficacia publicitaria profundizando en el efecto de la confianza en el medio Internet en la compra online. Los datos se extrajeron de la encuesta espa\u00f1ola sobre Equipamiento y Uso de TIC. La regresi\u00f3n log\u00edstica ofrece la probabilidad de compra de rasgos cl\u00e1sicos (sexo, edad, estudios, ingresos, situaci\u00f3n laboral), frecuencia de uso y confianza, en seis grupos de poblaci\u00f3n: usuarios de 21 a 71 a\u00f1os, mujeres y hombres usuarios de tales franjas y tres grupos de edades (generaciones Y, X y BB). La confianza y la frecuencia de uso tienen un gran efecto sobre la acci\u00f3n en todos los casos. El nivel de estudios tambi\u00e9n es determinante. Sin embargo, el sexo y la edad act\u00faan de forma diferenciada, y el nivel de ingresos y la situaci\u00f3n laboral no contribuyen a mejorar sustancialmente el modelo. While there is a general belief that e-commerce provides many opportunities to travel agencies, the reality is that traditional travel agencies face competition from several newcomers. Beside pressure from new mega travel agencies, the traditional travel agency also faces challenges from other innovative organisations as well as direct sales from tour operators. Furthermore, major threats stem from airlines and wholesale travel companies offering their products and services directly to the customer by replacing the travel agency as an intermediary, operating from physical offices, with online services. Competition coming from different fields will destroy the conventional marketing and distribution channels in future. It is in this context that the current study aims to determine the awareness and impact of e-commerce on travel agencies in EL, a small city in the province of the Eastern Cape (EC) in South Africa (SA). The survey population of this case study includes retail travel agencies in East London. A total number of 21 questionnaires were administered to travel agencies in EL, using the convenience sampling method. The findings explain that travel agencies generally are experiencing both the opportunities and the challenges of e-commerce adoption. The results indicated a high percentage of e-commerce use amongst travel agencies in EL. This means that the travel agency have adapted to technology in doing business and this is good as guests have developed into becoming digital natives.","published_in":"African Journal of Hospitality, Tourism and Leisure, Vol 9, Iss 1 (2020)","year":"2020-01-01T00:00:00Z","subject_orig":"e-commerce; travel agency; east london; effect; eastern cape; south africa; Hospitality industry. Notre \u00e8re \u00e9volue \u00e0 la vitesse du d\u00e9bit. L\u2019\u00e9volution est certes technologique, mais aussi impacte le comportement, la construction identitaire, la vie collective et le sens m\u00eame du monde qui nous entoure. Les r\u00e9seaux sociaux qui proclament \u00eatre \u00ab Communautaires \u00bb se voient nous cr\u00e9er des communaut\u00e9s individuelles et surtout virtuelles. Nous discutons sans prononcer, nous \u00ab likons \u00bb sans toucher, ni sentir. Nous avons des amis, beaucoup d\u2019amis, mais nous ne sommes m\u00eame pas s\u00fbrs qu\u2019ils existent. Nous partageons, des fois peut \u00eatre sans lire, ni comprendre. Et toutes ces informations existent stock\u00e9es quelque part \u00e0 la merci de puissantes multinationales qui nous qualifient de profils fructueux. L\u2019objectif n\u2019est pas d\u2019estomper de critiques ce nouveau monde, surtout avec les scandales qui explosent, avec tout r\u00e9cemment Cambridge Analytica \u2026, mais de s\u2019attarder aussi sur ses b\u00e9n\u00e9fices, tels que le partage instructif, l\u2019abolition des fronti\u00e8res mondiales, la proclamation des droits, la d\u00e9nonciation des injustices, la position d\u2019\u00e9gal \u00e0 \u00e9gal\u2026 Le constat est que la balance se dandine ne sachant o\u00f9 se tenir. Les fervents utilisateurs peuvent chanter les louanges et les m\u00e9faits de cette technologie virtuelle en l\u2019espace de quelques minutes, mais continueront tout de m\u00eame \u00e0 nourrir ce nouveau monde. Est-ce une d\u00e9pendance ? Ou une schizophr\u00e9nie ? Lemieux en 1999, avait d\u00e9fini les r\u00e9seaux sociaux comme un ensemble d\u2019interactions de diff\u00e9rentes formes et natures. Initialement \u00e9tudi\u00e9s sous le mod\u00e8le structurale, les \u00e9tudes sur les r\u00e9seaux sociaux ont bifurqu\u00e9 vers 2 th\u00e9ories : \u00ab La th\u00e9orie des graphes \u00bb de Wasserman et Faust en 1994 qui tend \u00e0 \u00e9tudier les relations entre les acteurs des r\u00e9seaux sociaux et les liens forts ou faibles qui les unissent, et \u00ab La connaissance d\u2019autrui \u00bb \u00e9tudi\u00e9e par V. Chauvet et B. Chollet, en 2010, qui s\u2019int\u00e9resse au niveau de proximit\u00e9 entre les acteurs intragroupes. En s\u2019inscrivant dans un groupe, l\u2019individu devient un atome social et se conforme \u00e0 l\u2019ensemble, d\u2019o\u00f9 le sous bassement du contr\u00f4le social sur les r\u00e9seaux sociaux, qui selon Delenze est purement un instrument Marketing. Le contr\u00f4le social peut se traduire en surveillance ou en influence. Toutefois, les travaux de Hardt et Negri, Bogard (2006) affirment que l\u2019\u00e9conomie num\u00e9rique permet paradoxalement l\u2019affirmation des singularit\u00e9s subjectives. L\u2019objectif de cet article est de ne pas tomber dans la subjectivit\u00e9, mais de faire un constat argument\u00e9, dans le cadre d\u2019une d\u00e9march\u00e9 descriptive, suite \u00e0 des \u00e9tudes qualitatives et quantitatives qui s\u2019effectueront aupr\u00e8s des habitants et des non habitants de ce nouveau monde.","published_in":"","year":"2020-02-22","subject_orig":"Digital; r\u00e9seaux sociaux; schizophr\u00e9nie; confiance; m\u00e9fiance; d\u00e9pendance","subject":"Digital; r\u00e9seaux sociaux; schizophr\u00e9nie; confiance; m\u00e9fiance; d\u00e9pendance","authors":"SOUDI NADA","link":"https:\/\/zenodo.org\/record\/3679388","oa_state":"1","url":"d6b08774cde229a010a23697cbf31a5f09fe032ee5a35e61801c595ff0726281","relevance":28},{"id":"aeb42da0d3545b45056790f2355e64b2f794d5f9014e10ee99e47e9969b6741e","relation":"doi:10.5281\/zenodo.3833231; https:\/\/zenodo.org\/record\/3833232; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.5281\/zenodo.3833232; oai:zenodo.org:3833232","identifier":"https:\/\/zenodo.org\/record\/3833232; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.5281\/zenodo.3833232","title":"Rob\u00f4 Milion\u00e1rio - M\u00e9todo Rob\u00f4 Milion\u00e1rio Vale a Pena ? \u00e9 Bom ? Download","paper_abstract":"Se voc\u00ea est\u00e1 lendo essa postagem \u00e9 porque quer saber mais sobre como funciona o curso Rob\u00f4 Milion\u00e1rio, n\u00e3o \u00e9 mesmo? Se realmente vale a pena ou como ele funciona. O crescimento do Marketing Digital acompanha o interesse das pessoas em poder trabalhar com mais liberdade e autonomia, e ainda assim, ganhar bem com isso. Ao mesmo tempo surgem in\u00fameros cursos e materiais prometendo ganhos r\u00e1pidos e f\u00e1ceis. Pois, saiba que isso n\u00e3o existe! As t\u00e9cnicas de Marketing Digital exigem tempo e dedica\u00e7\u00e3o at\u00e9 que se alcance os resultados esperados. Com tanto conte\u00fado na internet, \u00e9 necess\u00e1rio informar-se o m\u00e1ximo poss\u00edvel antes de adquirir qualquer produto ou servi\u00e7o. Por isso, revisamos mais um curso que pode te ajudar a conquistar a sonhada liberdade e autonomia utilizando automatiza\u00e7\u00e3o de vendas pela internet. O curso Rob\u00f4 Milion\u00e1rio: como funciona Se voc\u00ea j\u00e1 conheceu algu\u00e9m que tenha adquirido um curso de Markting Digital deve ter notado que provavelmente, essa pessoa n\u00e3o atingiu nem parte dos ganhos poss\u00edveis. Mesmo aplicando todas as t\u00e9cnicas corretamente. Mas, para alcan\u00e7ar resultados substanciais com marketing digital \u00e9 necess\u00e1rio atender \u00e0 dois pontos b\u00e1sicos: Tr\u00e1fego: potenciais clientes visualizando sua oferta\/produto; Convers\u00e3o: boa p\u00e1gina de vendas, funil de vendas e uma boa oferta. Dito isso, voc\u00ea poderia se perguntar qual a diferen\u00e7a entre o curso Rob\u00f4 Milion\u00e1rio e os demais cursos que existem na internet. Curso Rob\u00f4 Milion\u00e1rio \u00e9 Bom? Se realiz\u00f3 en la Unidad Educativa Particular la Providencia de la cuidad de Azogues, mediante enfoque cualitativo. Los resultados se describen a continuaci\u00f3n: Falta de conocimiento de rutas y protocolos de violencia entre pares por parte de la comunidad educativa. El personal del Departamenteo de Consejer\u00eda Estudiantil determin\u00f3 que es de vital otorgarle un tinte humanistico a la formulacion de estos manuales, para ello es indispensable la participaci\u00f3n de psic\u00f3logos en estos campos de acci\u00f3n ; The objective of the research was to find out the perception of the routes and protocols in the La Providencia de Azogues Educational Unit, by describing the perception of the phenomenon that professional psychologists have for generating an improvement project with innovative strategies that counteract the peer violence. Providence in the city of Azogues was carried out in the Private Educational Unit, using a qualitative approach. The results are described below: Lack of knowledge of routes and protocols of violence between peers by the educational community. https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1002\/mar.21327; https:\/\/onlinelibrary.wiley.com\/doi\/full\/10.1002\/mar.21327","title":"User\u2010generated content in the era of digital well\u2010being: A netnographic analysis in a healthcare marketing context","paper_abstract":"The disruptive strength of digital technologies in healthcare has led to valuable changes in the search for information and the application of these technologies. The introduction of these technologies has altered, sometimes even inverting, the doctor\u2013patient relationship. User\u2010generated content on social media and online communities represents a form of disruptive cooperation that has huge potential benefits for the future growth of society. Using netnographic analysis of smart patients and data from an online survey of Italian oncologists and health professionals, this paper shows the impact of user\u2010generated content on the pursuit of personal well\u2010being. The linkages between new forms of knowledge, business, and innovation are highlighted. Based on an analysis of the emerging concept of systems medicine, this paper focuses on the dimension of participation. A data\u2010driven approach is adopted, and the data, information, knowledge, and wisdom framework is used to explain how people employ user\u2010generated content in their pursuit of well\u2010being. Managerial perspectives and suggestions for future research developments are discussed","published_in":"","year":"2020","subject_orig":"disruptive cooperation; healthcare; oncology; social patients; user\u2010generated content; user\u2010generated data","subject":"disruptive cooperation; healthcare; oncology; social patients; user\u2010generated content; user\u2010generated data","authors":"Cuomo, M; Tortora, D; Giordano, A; Festa, G; Metallo, G; Martinelli, E","link":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10281\/256757","oa_state":"2","url":"914af6f2d09903c2e97d014af8071ddf1caae25c8f30e212d17ddfc586eef3ed","relevance":24},{"id":"9edb28ace00b210f5f6974dd69b6a97059209b4f328c4eb556cc0e28c9c18c30","relation":"","identifier":"http:\/\/dx.doi.org\/10.1177\/0276146719897366","title":"The Role of Market Devices for Price and Loyalty Strategies in 20th Century U.S. Grocery Stores","paper_abstract":"This paper explores the competitive dynamics of technical innovations and retailer strategies through a historical study of the role of market devices in contributing to price and loyalty competition strategies in the US grocery retail market during the 20th century. Our findings show that recurrent shifts between emphasizing price and using various customer loyalty arrangements were closely linked to, and supported by, the introduction of seemingly mundane technical devices. Our analysis of retailer competition incorporates the role of technical innovations as endogenous to retail dynamics, which is important to understand historical development, but also highly relevant for contemporary analyses given the current proliferation of digital devices within retailing.","published_in":"Journal of Macromarketing ; volume 40, issue 2, page 201-220 ; ISSN 0276-1467 1552-6534","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Marketing","subject":"Marketing","authors":"Hagberg, Johan; Kjellberg, Hans; Cochoy, Franck","link":"http:\/\/dx.doi.org\/10.1177\/0276146719897366","oa_state":"2","url":"9edb28ace00b210f5f6974dd69b6a97059209b4f328c4eb556cc0e28c9c18c30","relevance":23},{"id":"6e323c3b19f456f3f991a42eb6f03ecb2e1794a30e358fc4fcccb0cb05f449c2","relation":"","identifier":"http:\/\/dx.doi.org\/10.1177\/1206331219892527","title":"New Furniture for the Box Office: Computer, Ticket, Window","paper_abstract":"The arrival of the digital computer demanded a new spatial logic for performing arts ticketing. As late-20th-century box offices updated equipment, managers imagined a ticketing space that was open and airy, rather than closed and secure. Interactions between agents and audiences became collaborative, and ticket sales became central to marketing efforts. This article analyzes changes in the box office by historicizing the spaces of ticketing, drawing upon Bernhard Siegert\u2019s notion of cultural techniques, reading a diagram from a 1993 ticketing guru\u2019s book, and excavating archival and published materials bearing on performance spaces in Western Europe and North America. The article shows how technological, social, and political changes in the 1970s and \u201980s led to a substantial shift in the interactions that inhabit paraperformative spaces. In a concluding gesture, the article shows that these changes are themselves transitory and have since been succeeded by the digital ticketing familiar to early-21st-century audiences.","published_in":"Space and Culture ; page 120633121989252 ; ISSN 1206-3312 1552-8308","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Tourism, Leisure and Hospitality Management; Geography, Planning and Development; Arts and Humanities (miscellaneous); Cultural Studies; Urban Studies","subject":"Tourism, Leisure and Hospitality Management; Geography, Planning and Development; Arts and Humanities (miscellaneous); Cultural Studies; Urban Studies","authors":"Kushner, Scott","link":"http:\/\/dx.doi.org\/10.1177\/1206331219892527","oa_state":"2","url":"6e323c3b19f456f3f991a42eb6f03ecb2e1794a30e358fc4fcccb0cb05f449c2","relevance":22},{"id":"5eb6630f231ed6b2525085607d8dfbf9723d0513d6ebcc4f3da783507641d0ab","relation":"","identifier":"http:\/\/dx.doi.org\/10.1177\/1527476419897364","title":"Fiber, Fingers, and Code: Manufacturing Software and Seamlessness in the Garment Industry","paper_abstract":"This article describes how software is imagined and used to disrupt garment industry practices. Drawing from interviews, fieldwork, and discourse analysis of marketing from two companies, Stoll and Resonance, we argue that software is integral to the creation of a new kind of designer, a \u201cdigital craftsman,\u201d that directly interfaces with a new kind of supply chain. This interaction is defined by its \u201cseamlessness\u201d\u2014what we describe as both an emergent technical design element and an imaginary of software-enabled manufacturing free from friction between sites of concept development and its material execution. Counter to this imaginary, we mobilize the \u201ctactile grammar\u201d of seams to foreground the role of embodied communication and labor practices in shaping software-defined industrial futures. Studying the connections between fiber, fingers, and code, this article opens up new lines of inquiry into industrial software and into the links between media production and larger spheres of commodity production.","published_in":"Television & New Media ; page 152747641989736 ; ISSN 1527-4764 1552-8316","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Cultural Studies; Visual Arts and Performing Arts","subject":"Cultural Studies; Visual Arts and Performing Arts","authors":"Pasek, Anne; Starosielski, Nicole","link":"http:\/\/dx.doi.org\/10.1177\/1527476419897364","oa_state":"2","url":"5eb6630f231ed6b2525085607d8dfbf9723d0513d6ebcc4f3da783507641d0ab","relevance":21},{"id":"c14132923b67548dfac246f5367be8ad261894b570a348fab09cdde7668d010b","relation":"","identifier":"http:\/\/dx.doi.org\/10.1177\/1069031x19898678","title":"The Digital and Physical Footprint of Dark Net Markets","paper_abstract":"Over the past decade, the world has been contending with a growing set of challenges related to illicit traffic as advancements in technology, communications, and global integration facilitate the operation of black markets and greater organization of criminal activity. In this study, the dark web and associated dark net markets are introduced as an important context for scholars interested in international marketing. Furthermore, the scale, scope, and structure of the real-world drug trade is empirically analyzed as an example of the work possible within this dark world. The study concludes by highlighting key themes from the literature in international marketing scholarship and focuses on how they might be co-opted to contribute toward the understanding and countermarketing of illicit systems of exchange.","published_in":"Journal of International Marketing ; volume 28, issue 1, page 66-80 ; ISSN 1069-031X 1547-7215","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Marketing; Business and International Management","subject":"Marketing; Business and International Management","authors":"Thomaz, Felipe","link":"http:\/\/dx.doi.org\/10.1177\/1069031x19898678","oa_state":"2","url":"c14132923b67548dfac246f5367be8ad261894b570a348fab09cdde7668d010b","relevance":20},{"id":"b2689040caaa6776232287247274bd9912bbe3ff60233075968d0c1c4f39e454","relation":"https:\/\/www.cogitatiopress.com\/urbanplanning\/article\/view\/2989\/2989; https:\/\/www.cogitatiopress.com\/urbanplanning\/article\/view\/2989; doi:10.17645\/up.v5i2.2989","identifier":"https:\/\/www.cogitatiopress.com\/urbanplanning\/article\/view\/2989; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.17645\/up.v5i2.2989","title":"Digital Visualisation as a New Driver of Urban Change in Africa","paper_abstract":"Cities in Sub-Saharan Africa are growing faster than in any other part of the world, driven by expanding informal settlement (usually on the urban periphery) and the real-estate sector aiming for up-market property development. The continent currently has the highest real-estate value growth potential in the world. Much up-market property development is currently taking the form of new \u2018cities\u2019\u2014sometimes a redevelopment of an entire city (e.g., Kigali), sometimes a new city on an urban edge (e.g., Eko-Atlantic, Lagos) and sometimes a new satellite city (e.g., Tatu City, Nairobi). These projects are driven by international property development companies often in collaboration with governments and sometimes with local planning and property partners. All manifest as plans in a new way: as graphics on the websites of international consultants. Most involve no public participation and attempt to by-pass planning laws and processes. Producing these new plans (as computer generated images) are a new set of professionals: architects, planners, visualisers, advertising executives and project managers, working together in offices in global capitals of the world. Their aim is commercial. Planning in these projects is no longer shaped by the materiality of the city and attempts to achieve socio-spatial justice and sustainability. Rather planning is shaped by the circulation of graphics through a network of software programmes and marketing professionals. This article will situate Africa\u2019s new cities in theorisation of urban development and the role of urban planning through digital visualization.","published_in":"Urban Planning; Vol 5, No 2 (2020): Visual Communication in Urban Design and Planning: The Impact of Mediatisation(s) on the Construction of Urban Futures; Journal of Consumer Affairs, 52(1), 115-137. http:\/\/doi.org\/drdv; https:\/\/www.mediterranea-comunicacion.org\/article\/view\/2020-v11-n2-neuromarketing-y-la-medicion-del-efecto-de-la-publicidad-de-influencers-en-adolescente; doi:10.14198\/MEDCOM2020.11.2.11","identifier":"https:\/\/www.mediterranea-comunicacion.org\/article\/view\/2020-v11-n2-neuromarketing-y-la-medicion-del-efecto-de-la-publicidad-de-influencers-en-adolescente; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.14198\/MEDCOM2020.11.2.11","title":"Neuromarketing and effectiveness of influencers\u2019 promoted content on teenagers ; Neuromarketing y la medici\u00f3n del efecto de la publicidad de influencers en adolescentes","paper_abstract":"Influencer-marketing is an advertising format regarded as highly effective in both business and academic contexts. Consumers perceive influencers\u2019 recommendations as more trustworthy, less commercial, and more natural than traditional digital advertising. An experiment was carried out employing the Sociograph neuromarketing technique to assess its effectiveness on teenagers. This instrument measures the electrodermal level of the sample watching the videos. Traditional spots and other types of influencers\u2019 advertising content were compared to measure the attention and emotional levels in a sample of 19 girls aged from 11 to 16 years. The experiment was conducted in a laboratory of the Complutense University of Madrid in June 2019 and was followed by a post-visualisation survey. The results show that the videos showing influencers\u2019 content are those generating the most attention peaks. One of the influencers\u2019 branded content was also the video creating the greatest peak of emotion and perceived as the most exciting video out of all the videos analysed. This exploratory study also reveals that influencers\u2019 credibility and prior brand-awareness knowledge could also have an influence in positive perception of the videos and the brand. ; La publicidad de influencers es un formato publicitario que se considera muy eficaz en la pr\u00e1ctica empresarial y acad\u00e9mica. El consumidor lo percibe como un contenido m\u00e1s cre\u00edble, menos publicitario y m\u00e1s natural que un formato publicitario tradicional. Para medir su efectividad en adolescentes se ha realizado un experimento exploratorio a trav\u00e9s de la herramienta de neuromarketing Sociograph que mide la actividad electrod\u00e9rmica. Se compar\u00f3 diferentes tipos de contenidos publicitarios protagonizados por influencers con spots publicitarios tradicionales midiendo el nivel de atenci\u00f3n y emoci\u00f3n que provocaban al ser visualizados combinada con una encuesta post visualizaci\u00f3n. La muestra constaba de 19 ni\u00f1as de 11 a 16 a\u00f1os. Se realiz\u00f3 en un laboratorio de la Universidad Complutense de Madrid en Junio de 2019. De los diferentes tipos de est\u00edmulos analizados, los contenidos protagonizados por influencers son los que m\u00e1s picos de atenci\u00f3n generaron. Uno de los branded content de influencers tambi\u00e9n fue el video que mayor pico de emoci\u00f3n gener\u00f3 y el video que m\u00e1s emocion\u00f3 a la muestra de todos los visualizados. Este estudio exploratorio parece indicar que la credibilidad de los influencers y el conocimiento previo de la marca tambi\u00e9n podr\u00edan afectar a la percepci\u00f3n positiva del anuncio.","published_in":"Revista Mediterr\u00e1nea de Comunicaci\u00f3n \/ Mediterranean Journal of Communication; Panorama de Medios. https:\/\/bit.ly\/31jCR0R; https:\/\/www.mediterranea-comunicacion.org\/article\/view\/2020-v11-n2-nuevas-estrategias-persuasivas-publicitarias-por-induccion-de-niveles-de-procesamiento-psicologico; doi:10.14198\/MEDCOM2020.11.2.5","identifier":"https:\/\/www.mediterranea-comunicacion.org\/article\/view\/2020-v11-n2-nuevas-estrategias-persuasivas-publicitarias-por-induccion-de-niveles-de-procesamiento-psicologico; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.14198\/MEDCOM2020.11.2.5","title":"The new persuasive advertising strategies through induction levels of psychological processing ; Las nuevas estrategias persuasivas publicitarias por inducci\u00f3n de niveles de procesamiento psicol\u00f3gico","paper_abstract":"In the twentieth century, advertising used a persuasive strategy via reiteration of the advertising stimulus. This encouraged the consumer to store some properties of the brand \/ product with a favourable attitude in his memory. The decrease in advertising efficacy due to media saturation, overload of information or technical and technological transformations has prompted advertising to seek out new more effective forms of communication. This article highlights the diversification of persuasive strategies favouring interactivity and the circulation of messages beyond the traditional channels. Accordingly, it presents a Model of Levels of Advertising Message Processing, based on the results of this research, integrating the four different persuasive advertising strategies identified in a set. Each of these strategies induces progressive degrees of psychological processing and interactivity with advertising of a different nature, complexity and intensity on the recipient. This generates higher levels of advertising effectiveness than the unidirectional advertising of past decades. These results show that the advertiser's relationship with the consumer modes has been modified. This has consequences for both the professional sector and the research into the current effectiveness and advertising structure. ; Durante el siglo XX, la publicidad utiliz\u00f3 una estrategia persuasiva por mera reiteraci\u00f3n del est\u00edmulo publicitario que buscaba en el consumidor el almacenamiento en su memoria de algunas propiedades de la marca\/producto con una actitud favorable. La disminuci\u00f3n de la eficacia publicitaria por la saturaci\u00f3n medi\u00e1tica, la sobreinformaci\u00f3n o los cambios t\u00e9cnicos y tecnol\u00f3gicos, han hecho que la publicidad busque nuevas estrategias persuasivas m\u00e1s eficaces. Este art\u00edculo evidencia que se ha producido una diversificaci\u00f3n de estrategias persuasivas que favorecen la interactividad y la circulaci\u00f3n de mensajes fuera de los canales tradicionales, y propone un Modelo de Niveles de Procesamiento del Mensaje Publicitario, basado en los resultados de esta investigaci\u00f3n, que integra en un sistema de conjunto las cuatro diferentes estrategias persuasivas publicitarias identificadas. Cada una de estas estrategias induce en el receptor grados progresivos de procesamiento psicol\u00f3gico e interactividad con la publicidad de diferente naturaleza, complejidad e intensidad, lo que genera mayores niveles de eficacia publicitaria en comparaci\u00f3n con la publicidad unidireccional de \u00e9pocas pasadas. Estos resultados muestran que han cambiado los modos de relaci\u00f3n del anunciante con el consumidor, lo tiene consecuencias tanto para el sector profesional como para la investigaci\u00f3n de la \u0406\u043d\u0442\u0435\u0440\u043d\u0435\u0442.\u041a\u043b\u044e\u0447\u043e\u0432\u0456 \u0441\u043b\u043e\u0432\u0430: \u0442\u0443\u0440\u0444\u0456\u0440\u043c\u0430, \u0442\u0443\u0440\u043f\u0440\u043e\u0434\u0443\u043a\u0442; \u043d\u043e\u0432\u0438\u0439 \u0442\u0443\u0440\u043f\u0440\u043e\u0434\u0443\u043a\u0442; digital-\u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433, \u0456\u043d\u0442\u0435\u0440\u043d\u0435\u0442-\u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433; \u0432\u0438\u0432\u0435\u0434\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044f \u043d\u0430 \u0440\u0438\u043d\u043e\u043a. ; The concept of \u201ctourist product\u201d is analyzed, attention is focused on the fact that the novelty of the product is the result of a creative search and independent commercial value. A tourist product may be new in relation to meeting a new need or a new consumer, an existing product, a new market. The evaluation of the application of the concept of \u201cnew product\u201d in marketing has been carried out. Means of achieving the commercial value of tourism products are proposed. The need for constant updating of the product range of a tourist enterprise is determined. Varieties and features of the introduction of new tourism products are considered. The scheme of the process of planning the promotion of a new tourist product is presented, with the concretization of means of retaining consumers and identifying the target segment. This idea of planning the promotion of a new tourist product allows you to minimize the risks that arise both in the external and internal environment. Horizontal and vertical methods of promoting new tourism products to the market, their essence, features, advantages and differences under restrictions on the activities of tourism enterprises, are determined. The necessity of taking into account the peculiarities of new tourism products when entering the market is proved, in particular, promotion methods are defined. The corporate and contractual schemes of vertical cooperation and their application areas, parity partnership schemes and cooperative ties of horizontal promotion through outsourcing are investigated. Means are proposed for achieving the commercial success of a formed tourism product based on market testing, trial marketing, and market testing. Possible causes of failures in interactions with consumers of a new tourism product are identified. The use of Internet technologies that are developing rapidly to promote new tourism products is proposed. The methods of online advertising are indicated: traditional (offline) and a digital model in terms of promoting a travel product on the global Internet.Keywords: travel agency, tourist product; new tourist product; digital marketing, internet marketing; market launch.","published_in":"\u0412\u0435\u0441\u0442\u043d\u0438\u043a \u0425\u0435\u0440\u0441\u043e\u043d\u0441\u043a\u043e\u0433\u043e \u043d\u0430\u0446\u0438\u043e\u043d\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0442\u0435\u0445\u043d\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u043a\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0443\u043d\u0438\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0441\u0438\u0442\u0435\u0442\u0430; \u0422\u043e\u043c 2, \u2116 1(72) (2020) ; Visnik of Kherson National Technical University; \u0422\u043e\u043c 2, \u2116 1(72) (2020) ; \u0412\u0456\u0441\u043d\u0438\u043a \u0425\u0435\u0440\u0441\u043e\u043d\u0441\u044c\u043a\u043e\u0433\u043e \u043d\u0430\u0446\u0456\u043e\u043d\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0442\u0435\u0445\u043d\u0456\u0447\u043d\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0443\u043d\u0456\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0441\u0438\u0442\u0435\u0442\u0443; \u0422\u043e\u043c 2, \u2116 1(72) (2020) ; 2078-4481","year":"2020-06-04","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"\u0428\u0430\u0440\u043a\u043e, \u041c\u0430\u0440\u0433\u0430\u0440\u0438\u0442\u0430 \u0412\u0430\u0441\u0438\u043b\u0456\u0457\u0432\u043d\u0430; \u041f\u0435\u0442\u0440\u0443\u0448\u0435\u043d\u043a\u043e, \u041d\u0430\u0442\u0430\u043b\u044f \u0412\u043e\u043b\u043e\u0434\u0438\u043c\u0438\u0440\u0456\u0432\u043d\u0430","link":"http:\/\/journals.kntu.net.ua\/index.php\/visnyk\/article\/view\/441","oa_state":"1","url":"30a9622dfaecee3bd8f035c416cc435efdd01381aaa2b6cde3537992d0497b43","relevance":16},{"id":"144c1c9fd62ac002eb147cea2cc865b12b80a8439f28094888506d11220862fb","relation":"https:\/\/revistas.udenar.edu.co\/index.php\/rtend\/article\/view\/5606\/6319; Al-Hyari, K. Asia Pacific Journal of Management, 29(4), 1131\u20131142. https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1007\/s10490-011-9263-7; https:\/\/revistas.udenar.edu.co\/index.php\/rtend\/article\/view\/5606; doi:10.22267\/rtend.202101.134","identifier":"https:\/\/revistas.udenar.edu.co\/index.php\/rtend\/article\/view\/5606; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.22267\/rtend.202101.134","title":"Innovation barriers in SMES: an approximation through a systematic review of literature ; Barreras de innovaci\u00f3n en PYMES: una aproximaci\u00f3n a trav\u00e9s de una revisi\u00f3n sistem\u00e1tica de literatura ; Barreiras de inova\u00e7\u00e3o nas PME: uma aproxima\u00e7\u00e3o atrav\u00e9s de uma revis\u00e3o sistem\u00e1tica da literatura","paper_abstract":"Innovation is a key factor in the competitiveness of countries and companies. Small and medium-sized companies that do not adopt innovation as part oftheir core strategy run the risk of not being competitive due to falling behind with obsolete products and processes. Innovative companies are decisive for adynamic and competitive economy. The purpose of this research is to identify the different barriers that affect the performance of the innovation process in small and medium-sized enterprises \u2013 PYMES. To analyze the innovation barriers that PYMES face, a review of the existing literature in different parts of the world, including Colombia, was carried out. The importance of this study derives from the fact that very few studies have explored the question of the factors that limit the innovation processes of PYMES, being a topic that offers guidance for future research in a field that is still emerging. ; La innovaci\u00f3n es un factor clave en la competitividad de los pa\u00edses y las empresas. Las peque\u00f1as y medianas empresas que no adoptan la innovaci\u00f3n dentro de su estrategia central corren el riesgo de no ser competitivas debido a quedarse rezagadas con productos y procesos obsoletos. Las empresas innovadoras son determinantes para una econom\u00eda din\u00e1mica y competitiva. El prop\u00f3sito de esta investigaci\u00f3n es identificar las diferentes barreras que afectan el desempe\u00f1odel proceso de innovaci\u00f3n en las peque\u00f1as y medianas empresas - PYMES. Para analizar las barreras de innovaci\u00f3n a las que se enfrentan las PYMES, se realiz\u00f3 una revisi\u00f3n de la literatura existente en diferentes lugares del mundo, incluyendo a Colombia. La importancia de este estudio se deriva del hecho de que muy pocos estudios han explorado la cuesti\u00f3n de los factores que limitan los procesos de innovaci\u00f3n de las PYMES, siendo un tema que ofrece orientaci\u00f3n para futuras investigaciones en un campo que a\u00fan est\u00e1 en emergiendo. ; A inova\u00e7\u00e3o \u00e9 um fator chave na competitividade de pa\u00edses e empresas. As pequenas e m\u00e9dias empresas que n\u00e3o adotam a inova\u00e7\u00e3o como parte de suaestrat\u00e9gia principal correm o risco de n\u00e3o serem competitivas devido ao atraso nos produtos e processos obsoletos. Empresas inovadoras s\u00e3o decisivas parauma economia din\u00e2mica e competitiva. O objetivo desta pesquisa \u00e9 identificar as diferentes barreiras que afetam o desempenho do processo de inova\u00e7\u00e3o em pequenas e m\u00e9dias empresas - PME. Para analisar as barreiras \u00e0 inova\u00e7\u00e3oenfrentadas pelas PMEs, foi realizada uma revis\u00e3o da literatura existente em diferentes partes do mundo, incluindo a Col\u00f4mbia. A import\u00e2ncia deste estudo deriva do fato de pouqu\u00edssimos estudos explorarem a quest\u00e3o dos fatores que limitam os processos de inova\u00e7\u00e3o das PMEs, sendo um t\u00f3pico que oferece orienta\u00e7\u00e3o para futuras pesquisas em um campo ainda em desenvolvimento.","published_in":"Tendencias; Vol. 21 N\u00fam. 1 (2020): Vol. XXI No. 1 Primer Semestre Enero - Junio 2020; 221-237 ; Tendencias; v. 21 n. 1 (2020): Vol. XXI N\u00ba 1 Primeiro Semestre Janeiro - Junho 2020; 221-237 ; Tendencias; Vol 21 No 1 (2020): Vol. XXI No. 1 First Semester January - June 2020; 221-237 ; 2539-0554 ; 0124-8693","year":"2020-06-30","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Benavides Pupiales, Luis Eduardo; Bola\u00f1os Delgado, Sandra Luc\u00eda","link":"https:\/\/revistas.udenar.edu.co\/index.php\/rtend\/article\/view\/5606","oa_state":"1","url":"144c1c9fd62ac002eb147cea2cc865b12b80a8439f28094888506d11220862fb","relevance":15},{"id":"b7ee7e951746c9bd1546f81489f6d0857f464b6c0a58c1b7b013a4e0c8f7b9e0","relation":"https:\/\/revistas.unal.edu.co\/index.php\/innovar\/article\/view\/85218\/74442; https:\/\/revistas.unal.edu.co\/index.php\/innovar\/article\/view\/85218\/75155; Almeida, L., ArA\u00dajo, A. e Martins, C.
