It is concluded that companies must invest in infrastructure and improve their technological position ; as well as the level of technology implementation ; regarding the marketing use of social networks is relevant and companies must own a brand ; name ; logo and tag to be inserted in local and international markets. Both variables have an impact on business competitiveness ; El objetivo de este estudio emp\u00edrico es analizar desde el enfoque te\u00f3rico de recursos y capacidades la relaci\u00f3n entre la tecnolog\u00eda y la comercializaci\u00f3n en la PyME ubicada en Zacatecas ; M\u00e9xico. La metodolog\u00eda empleada fue el an\u00e1lisis factorial exploratorio de m\u00e1xima verosimilitud de ecuaciones estructurales ; la variable \u201ctecnolog\u00eda\u201d se midi\u00f3 a trav\u00e9s de una escala construida con base en la revisi\u00f3n de literatura compuesta por 4 preguntas ; la variable \u201ccomercializaci\u00f3n\u201d se midi\u00f3 por tres \u00edtems. Los resultados muestran que la tecnolog\u00eda impacta de manera significativa en la comercializaci\u00f3n. Se concluye que las empresas deben invertir en infraestructura y mejorar su posici\u00f3n tecnol\u00f3gica ; as\u00ed como el nivel de implementaci\u00f3n de tecnolog\u00eda ; respecto a la comercializaci\u00f3n la utilizaci\u00f3n de redes sociales es relevante y las empresas deben de poseer una marca ; nombre ; logotipo y etiqueta para insertarse en los mercados locales e internacionales. Ambas variables repercuten en la competitividad empresarial. Competitividad; Tecnolog\u00eda; Comercializaci\u00f3n; PYME; Competitiveness; technology; commercialization; SME Mercados y Negocios: Revista de Investigaci\u00f3n y y An\u00e1lisis ; ISSN 1665-7039 ; N\u00ba. 41 (enero-junio) ; 2020 ; pags. 107-124 Correa Garc\u00eda; Luis \u00c1ngel"},{"id":"92f0a2c0c3edb8cac98b6d49a4e6ffbbaa2aba616e0cc3055e76697b42f2915e","content":"Estrategias de marketing viral y el posicionamiento de marca en el sector farmac\u00e9utico That the brand is the most favorable perception to influence the moment of acquisition in the minds of customers ; where a link is created between the consumer and the organization. Therefore ; the Swiss pharmacy chain located in the Ca\u00f1ar province ; in the city of Azogues-Ecuador ; is a company dedicated to the sale of pharmaceutical products. This research aims to develop viral marketing and brand positioning strategies in the pharmaceutical sector. The applied methodology is descriptive ; transversal with a mixed approach using the inductive-deductive method. The lack of strategies was found according to the new technology era where you have a digital consumer and always up to date in the technology era with an increasingly virtual buying trend. It is concluded that the contribution of viral marketing strategies is essential to improve positioning. ; La marca es la percepci\u00f3n m\u00e1s favorable para incidir en el momento de la adquisici\u00f3n en la mente de los clientes ; en donde se crea un nexo entre el consumidor y la organizaci\u00f3n. Por lo tanto ; Cadena de farmacias Suiza ubicada en la provincia del Ca\u00f1ar ; en la cuidad de Azogues-Ecuador ; es una empresa dedicada a la venta de productos farmac\u00e9uticos. La presente investigaci\u00f3n tiene como objetivo desarrollar estrategias de marketing viral y de posicionamiento de marca en el sector farmac\u00e9utico. La metodolog\u00eda aplicada es de tipo descriptivo ; transversal con un enfoque mixto utilizando el m\u00e9todo inductivo-deductivo. Se encontr\u00f3 la carec\u00eda de estrategias acorde a la nueva era tecnolog\u00eda en donde se tiene un consumidor digital y siempre al d\u00eda en la era tecnolog\u00eda con una tendencia de compra cada vez m\u00e1s virtual. Se concluye que el aporte de las estrategias de marketing viral es fundamental para mejorar el posicionamiento. Economic and Administrative Sciences; Marketing; advertising; administration; management operations; publicidad; administraci\u00f3n; operaci\u00f3n administrativa Revista Arbitrada Interdisciplinaria Koinon\u00eda ; ISSN 2542-3088 ; Vol. 5 ; N\u00ba. 10 (Julio - Diciembre 2020) ; 2020 ; pags. 313-338 Siguenza Pe\u00f1afiel; Karina Monserrath; Erazo \u00c1lvarez; Juan Carlos; Narv\u00e1ez Zurita; Ivonne"},{"id":"6e0463eda094b99bd0e21e90877b2f264468189820a6665d6913923685cbfb2d","content":"Percepci\u00f3n de los decisores de centros comerciales sobre aplicaci\u00f3n de acciones de marketing The construction of shopping centers as a consequence of the increase in the participation of large brands of products and services, allows that in those scenarios, experience or sensorial marketing actions can be implemented and strengthened that, through the senses, allow generating positive reactions in the clients. This article aims to characterize the perception of the decision makers of the shopping centers in the city of Barranquilla, Colombia, about the application of sensory marketing actions, with the purpose of giving an overview of these practices in twelve selected shopping centers. For the present study, a descriptive, non-experimental, cross-sectional research was carried out, with a mixed approach, through the analysis method. In effect, the documentary review and the survey were used as a technique. The results obtained include a reflection of the sensory marketing strategies that must be strengthened to increase competitiveness, productivity and profitability, considering the high growth of the retail sector in Colombia. It is concluded that music, lighting and smells are the marketing actions that decision makers in the retail industry emphasize, being perceived as a strategy that generates better sales results and strengthens communication with customers. ; La construcci\u00f3n de centros comerciales como consecuencia del aumento de la participaci\u00f3n de grandes marcas de productos y servicios, consiente que en esos escenarios se puedan implementar y fortalecer acciones de marketing de experiencias o sensorial que, a trav\u00e9s de los sentidos, permitan generar reacciones positivas en los clientes. Este art\u00edculo tiene como objetivo caracterizar la percepci\u00f3n de los decisores de los centros comerciales en la ciudad de Barranquilla, Colombia, sobre la aplicaci\u00f3n de acciones de marketing sensorial, con el prop\u00f3sito de dar una visi\u00f3n general sobre \u00e9stas pr\u00e1cticas en doce centros comerciales seleccionados. Para el presente estudio se realiz\u00f3 una investigaci\u00f3n descriptiva, no experimental, transversal, con enfoque mixto, a trav\u00e9s del m\u00e9todo de an\u00e1lisis. En efecto se utiliz\u00f3 como t\u00e9cnica la revisi\u00f3n documental y la encuesta. Los resultados obtenidos incluyen una reflexi\u00f3n de las estrategias de marketing sensorial que deben ser fortalecidas para incrementar la competitividad, productividad y rentabilidad, considerando el alto crecimiento del sector retail en Colombia. Se concluye que la m\u00fasica, la iluminaci\u00f3n y los olores son las acciones de marketing que enfatizan los decisores en la industria retail, siendo percibidos como una estrategia que genera mejores resultados en ventas y afianza la comunicaci\u00f3n con los clientes. acciones de marketing; centros comerciales; estrategias de marketing; marketing sensorial; modelo est\u00edmulo-organismo-respuesta; marketing actions; shopping centers; marketing strategies; sensory marketing; stimulusorganism- response model Revista de ciencias sociales, ISSN 1315-9518, Vol. 26, N\u00ba. 2, 2020, pags. 148-162 Mu\u00f1oz Querales, Edgardo Enrique; Lechuga Cardozo, Jorge Isaac; Pulido Rojano, Alexander"},{"id":"7efa07d0ed814d9f3448a853bcc02c321d5a9bf4e43261d4afecca5295fa5147","content":"La prescriptora publicitaria de belleza en Espa\u00f1a y sus mecanismos de representaci\u00f3n: An\u00e1lisis a trav\u00e9s de la revista Telva Purpose: The social and cultural dimension of the commercial message attests to the link between advertising and the historical context in which it takes place, affecting women and communication from various perspectives. Therefore, this research aims to analyze the evolution of the image of women in advertising according to their role as prescribers of commercial messages related to brands and beauty products in the last 56 years of the History of Graphic Advertising in Spain. Design \/ Methodology \/ Approach: An exploratory and descriptive methodology is used via the technique of content analysis that applies to all the graphic advertisements of the Beauty and Hygiene sector inserted during the months of December in Telva, whose choice is based on the fact that it is the oldest high-end women\u2019s magazine in the country of research. The sample covers from the year 1963, date of the first issue, until 2018, having studied 1020 graphic advertisements. Results: There were differences in the treatment of the figure of women as advertising prescriber according to the decade analyzed, being common, however, a marked aspirational and connotative character in preaching as well as a small role for the male participant as a companion in the work of prescribing. The solidity of the feminine imprint is concluded in a women\u2019s communication aimed at women. Limitations \/ Implications: The case is restricted to the graphic medium journals, and it is possible to propose future complementary research on comparative analyses between various media and different sectors of business activity. Originality \/ Contribution: The extent and scope of the time of study covered stand out, allowing one to delve into the fundamentals of the advertising prescription prevailing today as well as highlighting the most outstanding particularities of the prescription of brands and cosmetic products. ; Objetivo del estudio: La dimensi\u00f3n social y cultural del mensaje comercial atestigua la vinculaci\u00f3n entre la publicidad y el contexto hist\u00f3rico en el que acontece, afectando al binomio mujer y comunicaci\u00f3n desde diversas perspectivas; as\u00ed, esta investigaci\u00f3n tiene como prop\u00f3sito analizar la evoluci\u00f3n de la imagen de la mujer en la publicidad atendiendo a su rol como prescriptora de mensajes comerciales relativos a marcas y productos de belleza, circunscribi\u00e9ndose el trabajo a los \u00faltimos 56 a\u00f1os de la Historia de la Publicidad gr\u00e1fica en Espa\u00f1a. Dise\u00f1o\/metodolog\u00eda\/enfoque: Se utiliza una metodolog\u00eda exploratoria y descriptiva mediante la t\u00e9cnica de an\u00e1lisis de contenido que se aplica a la totalidad de los anuncios gr\u00e1ficos del sector Belleza e Higiene insertados durante los meses de diciembre en Telva, cuya elecci\u00f3n se sustenta por ser la revista femenina de alta gama con mayor antig\u00fcedad en el pa\u00eds de investigaci\u00f3n. La muestra comprende desde el a\u00f1o 1963, fecha del primer ejemplar, hasta 2018, siendo objeto de estudio 1020 anuncios gr\u00e1ficos. Resultados: Se evidencian diferencias en el tratamiento de la figura de la mujer como prescriptora publicitaria en funci\u00f3n de la d\u00e9cada analizada, siendo comunes no obstante un marcado car\u00e1cter aspiracional y connotativo en la predicaci\u00f3n as\u00ed como un exiguo protagonismo del actante masculino como acompa\u00f1ante en la labor de prescripci\u00f3n. Se concluye la solidez de la impronta femenina en una comunicaci\u00f3n de mujeres destinada a mujeres. Limitaciones\/implicaciones: El caso se restringe al medio gr\u00e1fico revistas, pudi\u00e9ndose plantear futuras investigaciones complementarias sobre an\u00e1lisis comparativos entre varios medios y distintos sectores de actividad empresarial. Originalidad\/contribuci\u00f3n: Sobresalen la extensi\u00f3n y el alcance de la \u00e9poca de estudio cubierta, que permiten profundizar en los fundamentos de la prescripci\u00f3n publicitaria imperante en la actualidad y se\u00f1alar las particularidades m\u00e1s destacadas de la prescripci\u00f3n de marcas y productos cosm\u00e9ticos. Prescriptora; comunicaci\u00f3n; marketing; publicidad gr\u00e1fica; Telva; mujer; Prescriber; communication; graphic advertising; woman aDResearch: Revista Internacional de Investigaci\u00f3n en Comunicaci\u00f3n, ISSN 1889-7304, N\u00ba. 22, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: Monogr\u00e1fico Especial, Mujer y Comunicaci\u00f3n), pags. 34-59 Vicente Fern\u00e1ndez, Pilar; Arroyo Almaraz, Isidoro"},{"id":"0258aa5a5685a9d1a2eaf7571cbc3a664b81d10647386bf98b5b17c4da104ae3","content":"Efectos limitados a largo plazo del patrocinio deportivo; extensi\u00f3n del estudio sobre el caso de Divina Pastora en baloncesto profesional. [Limited long-term effect of sport sponsorship; extension of the study on the case of Divina Pastora in professional basketball]. This research has re-evaluated the effectiveness of the sponsorship arrangement between the insurance company Divina Pastora and the basketball team Joventut de Badalona. It is based on the work of Mart\u00ednez and Ruiz (2019), where different marketing variables were valued during the first 15 months of commercial relationship. In this study we have applied the same methodology, but with a long-term approach, 30 months after the beginning of the sponsorship. Therefore, a random sample of consumers was used in two different markets, which were interviewed by a specialized company. Results are consistent with the limited evidence of efficacy obtained in the short and medium term evaluations, although they differ in the level of aided recall. The professionals of the sector will have to evaluate if this type of limited benefits compensate the important economic investment that supposes to be the main sponsor of a team in professional sport. ; ResumenEl objetivo de este estudio fue la reevaluaci\u00f3n de la eficacia del patrocinio de la compa\u00f1\u00eda aseguradora Divina Pastora al Joventut de Badalona. Para ello se tom\u00f3 como base el trabajo de Mart\u00ednez y Ruiz (2019), donde se valoraron diferentes variables de marketing durante los primeros 15 meses de relaci\u00f3n comercial. En este estudio se aplic\u00f3 la misma metodolog\u00eda, pero con un enfoque a largo plazo, tras 30 meses del inicio del patrocinio. De este modo, se emple\u00f3 una muestra aleatoria de 150 y 151 participantes en dos mercados diferentes (Catalu\u00f1a y resto de Espa\u00f1a, respectivamente), a los que se entrevist\u00f3 telef\u00f3nicamente por medio de una empresa especializada. Los resultados fueron consistentes con la evidencia limitada de eficacia obtenida en las evaluaciones a corto y medio plazo, aunque difirieron en el nivel de recuerdo sugerido. Los profesionales del sector deber\u00e1n evaluar si este tipo de beneficios limitados compensan la gran inversi\u00f3n econ\u00f3mica que supone ser el patrocinador principal de un equipo de elite en el deporte profesional.AbstractThe aim of this study was the re-evaluation of the effectiveness of the sponsorship arrangement between the insurance company Divina Pastora and the basketball team Joventut de Badalona. It is based on the work of Mart\u00ednez and Ruiz (2019), where different marketing variables were valued during the first 15 months of commercial relationship. In this study we applied the same methodology, but with a long-term approach, 30 months after the beginning of the sponsorship. Therefore, a random sample of 150 and 151 individuals was used in two different markets (Catalonia and the rest of Spain, respectively), which were interviewed by a specialized company. Results were consistent with the limited evidence of efficacy obtained in the short and medium term evaluations, although they differed in the level of aided recall. The professionals of the sector will have to evaluate if this type of limited benefits compensate the important economic investment that supposes to be the main sponsor of a team in professional sport.https:\/\/doi.org\/10.5232\/ricyde2020.05905Referencias\/referencesBallouli, K.; Koesters, T. Revista Internacional de Ciencias del Deporte, ISSN 1885-3137, Vol. 16, N\u00ba. 59, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: Enero), pags. 57-66 Mart\u00ednez, Jos\u00e9 Antonio"},{"id":"ea3d047a340049adeb30591d8573aaf3b0623d3dd17440a6cb53515be5d54d03","content":"Consideraciones sobre poblaci\u00f3n excedente, trabajo y pobreza: el caso de los cirujas En diferentes lugares del mundo, en ciudades de tama\u00f1o mediano y grande, existen conjuntos relativamente numerosos de individuos y familias que organizan sus vidas alrededor de la basura. En ese contexto, este art\u00edculo, teniendo como foco el trabajo del \u201cciruja\u201d, propone realizar algunas consideraciones, rescatando su comprensi\u00f3n como poblaci\u00f3n excedente, pero que se inserta, a trav\u00e9s de la propia actividad, en la l\u00f3gica de acumulaci\u00f3n capitalista. Es necesario situar la actividad en el contexto de las relaciones sociales que se establecen en el interior del circuito econ\u00f3mico que gira en torno del reciclaje de la basura. De hecho, a pesar de su precariedad, la actividad de los cirujas constituye el primer eslab\u00f3n del circuito econ\u00f3mico que gira en torno del reciclaje, o sea, el extremo informal que abastece materia prima y materiales para su reutilizaci\u00f3n a la industria de reciclaje, pasando por los dep\u00f3sitos de compraventa en el proceso de comercializaci\u00f3n de los materiales, mecanismo por el cual se extrae el trabajo excedente de los cirujas. ; In different places around the world, cities of medium and large size show sets relatively extense of human being and families that organize their lives by means of garbage. In this context, this essay focusing on the work of picker of paper that proposes to carry some considerations out rescuing the comprehension while exceed population, but inserted through its own activity, at capitalist accumulation logic. It starts with the premise that is essential to situate the activity in the context of social relations that estabilishe itself within the economic circuit that revolves around recycling rubbish. As a matter of fact, even in its precariousness, the activity of pickers is the first link in the economic circuit that revolves around for industry of recycling. It means, the informal extreme that provides raw material and materials for reusing, through the intermediaries in the process of marketing of materials, mechanism by which extract the surplus labor from the pickers.  Contextos: Estudios de humanidades y ciencias sociales, ISSN 0719-1014, N\u00ba. 46, 2020 Escurra, Mar\u00eda Fernanda"},{"id":"18122d06f287179ed301c6c293d0d416a03a8470a4f02fa5a7318787ee89b74d","content":"Logistics Models in E-Commerce The rapid development of digital technology and its applications in almost all business areas has resulted in the emergence of new terms such as e-supply, e-administration, e-CRM, e-sport, m-commerce etc. This paper describes one of the logistics models in e-commerce based on outsourcing of logistics services, i.e. dropshipping. Presented are logistics processes in e-commerce, various logistic models, applied IT technologies and innovations, as well as principles of functioning and determining marketing methods for this type of trade. The research was conducted on the example of an online store selling toys and children\u2019s articles, which operated on the market based on the dropshipping model. A comparative analysis of the dropshipping warehouse offer was the main part of the research. logistics processes; logistics models; e-commerce; dropshipping; Materials of engineering and construction. Mechanics of materials; TA401-492 Research Papers. Faculty of Materials Science and Technology. Slovak University of Technology in Trnava, Vol 28, Iss 46, Pp 90-97 (2020) Witkowski Krzysztof; Koralewska Monika; Huk Katarzyna"},{"id":"15b14f9811e731d6067fb306991a4e537ebc0b82576f79d0cb6f57e26bc28f58","content":"2018 Presidential elections in Colombia: analysis of the news coverage of Caracol and RCN ; Las elecciones presidenciales del 2018 en Colombia: an\u00e1lisis del cubrimiento noticioso de los noticieros de Caracol y RCN The elections of 2018 in Colombia took place in the middle of a process of political transition in the post-conflict context where the continuity of peace agreements and the tension over new thematic agendas were at stake. This implied a scenario of uncertainty that was not alien to that also affected the media in the way in which they covered the electoral process. This article shows the results of the analysis made to 586 news of Caracol Noticias and Noticias RCN by the Media Observatory of the Universidad de la Sabana in partnership with the Electoral Observation Mission. The analysis shows a transformation in the thematic agenda, the persistence of polarization, the gender imbalance and the coexistence of traditional and new journalistic practices, surrounded by a scenario of political uncertainty that framed the electoral process. ; Las elecciones del 2018 en Colombia se dieron en medio de un proceso de transici\u00f3n pol\u00edtica en el marco del posconflicto donde estaba en juego la continuidad de los acuerdos de paz y la tensi\u00f3n por nuevas agendas tem\u00e1ticas. Esto implic\u00f3 un escenario de incertidumbre que no fue ajeno a los medios de comunicaci\u00f3n e incidi\u00f3 en la forma en como cubrieron el proceso electoral. Este articulo muestra los resultados del an\u00e1lisis realizado a 586 noticias de Caracol Noticias y Noticias RCN por parte del Observatorio de Medios de la Universidad de la Sabana en alianza con la Misi\u00f3n de Observaci\u00f3n Electoral. El an\u00e1lisis evidencia una transformaci\u00f3n en la agenda tem\u00e1tica, la persistencia de la polarizaci\u00f3n, el desequilibrio de g\u00e9nero y la coexistencia de pr\u00e1cticas period\u00edsticas tradicionales y nuevas, en medio del escenario de incertidumbre pol\u00edtica que enmarco el proceso electoral. Elections; public opinion; informational balance; agenda setting; media coverage; Elecciones; opini\u00f3n p\u00fablica; equilibrio informativo; cubrimiento medi\u00e1tico Estudios sobre el Mensaje Period\u00edstico; Vol. 26 N\u00fam. 1 (2020); 47-57 ; 1988-2696 ; 1134-1629 C\u00e1rdenas Ruiz, Juan David"},{"id":"e3f4c8ee8445f8948225cfb6c98df32722eadb09fa921f1e7361eb8ea24b30bf","content":"Persuasive communication in Politics as a Fundamental Element in the Success of New Political Parties in Spain: Issuer, Message and Context. The case of Podemos and Ciudadanos ; La comunicaci\u00f3n persuasiva en pol\u00edtica como elemento fundamental en el \u00e9xito de nuevas formaciones pol\u00edticas en Espa\u00f1a: emisor, mensaje y contexto. Caso Podemos y Ciudadanos The communication is a key element in any electoral process, which efficiency is determined by variables as the characteristics socio-demographic of the voters, the power of the issuer of the political message, the channel chosen for the diffusion of the political speeches or the economic environment where the election campaign takes place. Following this argument, the present article will focus on describing thecontent of the political messages used in Spain during December 2015. The reason is that this period coincides with the development of the campaign electoral that ended on December 20 with the celebration of a general elections. Specifically, the article analyzes the persuasive language used for two new political forms that could determinated the electoral results, not being possible to reach the sufficient majority to form government. The consequence was the celebration of a new choices on June 26, 2016. These political forms are \u00abCiudadanos\u00bb and \u00abPodemos\u00bb. There is very prominent the importance of this study since immediately after the presence of these two political forces, the political Spanish situation has changed in the whole nation. Both political forms and his messages have managed to catch the attention of thousands of citizens and there has existed a clear change of intention of vote of the traditional parties. The study of the persuasive message of Podemos and Ciudadanos is very important to understand the vote in Spain today. ; La comunicaci\u00f3n es un elemento clave en la captaci\u00f3n de votos en cualquier proceso electoral, cuya efectividad se ve condicionada por variables como las caracter\u00edsticas sociodemogr\u00e1ficas del receptor, el poder del emisor, el canal elegido para su difusi\u00f3n o el entorno econ\u00f3mico donde se desarrolle el discurso. En este contexto el estudio del lenguaje persuasivo cobra una especial relevancia, puesto que de su uso depender\u00e1, en muchos casos, que la intenci\u00f3n con la que se lanza el mensaje coincida con los resultados esperados. Es por ello, que se hace necesario profundizar en el conocimiento de los elementos del mensaje de persuasi\u00f3n en pol\u00edtica que determinan la intencionalidad del voto y sus efectos sobre los resultados electorales. M\u00e1s concretamente, en el presente art\u00edculo se propone un an\u00e1lisis del contenido persuasivo de los mensajes utilizados en Espa\u00f1a durante el mes de diciembre de 2015, periodo que coincide con la campa\u00f1a electoral previa a los comicios celebrados el 20 de diciembre de ese mismo a\u00f1o, por dos nuevas formas pol\u00edticas que surgen de dos idearios diferenciados: Ciudadanos y Podemos, como una de las causas de los resultados electorales obtenidos en los comicios celebrados en dicha fecha y que supusieron la desestabilizaci\u00f3n del parlamento espa\u00f1ol, al no ser posible alcanzar la mayor\u00eda suficiente para formar gobierno y cuya consecuencia fue la celebraci\u00f3n de unas nuevas elecciones el 26 de junio de 2016. Es muy destacable la importancia de este estudio puesto que, a ra\u00edz de la presencia de estas dos fuerzas pol\u00edticas, el panorama pol\u00edtico espa\u00f1ol ha cambiado en toda la naci\u00f3n. Los dos partidos y sus mensajes han logrado captar la atenci\u00f3n de miles de ciudadanos y ha existido un cambio claro de intenci\u00f3n de voto de los partidos tradicionales. De manera que el estudio del mensaje persuasivo de Podemos y de Ciudadanos es de vital importancia para comprender la intencionalidad de voto actualmente en Espa\u00f1a. General elections; campaign electoral; persuasive language; communication; political form; Persuasi\u00f3n; pol\u00edtica; comunicaci\u00f3n; partidos pol\u00edticos; campa\u00f1a electoral Estudios sobre el Mensaje Period\u00edstico; Vol. 26 N\u00fam. 1 (2020); 59-69 ; 1988-2696 ; 1134-1629 Cardete Quintero, Mar\u00eda Jes\u00fas; de Esteban Curiel, Javier; Antonovica, Arta"},{"id":"c4c062aea74fdc11b124bf90f2d9ef892bff7360efdd77302259163e0d91ae85","content":"Ethics and deontology in advertising. Nike 'Dream Crazier' 2019 as a feminist campaign at Instagram ; \u00c9tica y deontolog\u00eda en publicidad. Nike 'Dream Crazier' 2019 como campa\u00f1a feminista en Instagram This research studies the Nike Dream Crazier 2019 campaign, on Instagram, in the first month of its release. A double methodology is established: a longitudinal bibliographical exploration, which reflects on ethics and deontology, on sexist advertising, and the main investigations that define the phenomenon; and a correlational inquiry, which measures virality on Instagram, through the hashtag #DreamCrazier and the 10 most influential users, according to the Keyhole software. The results show that influencers are unknown women, who use a simple language, loaded with hashtags and emojis, which reduce the language barrier. They become the paradigm of cultural produsage, being users of the brand and producing positive advertising contents that spread throughout the world. ; Esta investigaci\u00f3n estudia la campa\u00f1a Nike Dream Crazier 2019, en Instagram, en el primer mes de lanzamiento. Se establece una metodolog\u00eda doble: exploraci\u00f3n bibliogr\u00e1fica longitudinal, que reflexiona sobre \u00e9tica y deontolog\u00eda, en publicidad sexista, y las principales investigaciones que definen el fen\u00f3meno; e indagaci\u00f3n correlacional, que mide la viralidad en Instagram, a trav\u00e9s del hashtag #DreamCrazier y los 10 usuarios m\u00e1s influyentes, seg\u00fan el software Keyhole. Los resultados muestran que las influencers son mujeres desconocidas, que emplean un lenguaje sencillo, cargado de hashtags y emojis, que reducen la barrera idiom\u00e1tica. Se convierten en paradigma del produsage cultural, siendo usuarias de la marca y produciendo contenidos publicitarios positivos que expanden por todo el mundo. Advertising; ethics; Instagram; hashtags; female sport; Publicidad; \u00e9tica; deporte femenino Comunicaci\u00f3n y G\u00e9nero; Vol 3 No 1 (2020); 3-15 ; Comunicaci\u00f3n y G\u00e9nero; Vol. 3 N\u00fam. 1 (2020); 3-15 ; 2605-1982 Padilla Castillo, Graciela; Presol Herrero, \u00c1frica"},{"id":"8f943b32330496df9af0d649257d52b1d0dfa29355b9623231faef57e2c5c43e","content":"Customized Approach to the Implementation of Educational Programs for Training Engineers ; \u041a\u0430\u0441\u0442\u043e\u043c\u0438\u0437\u0438\u0440\u043e\u0432\u0430\u043d\u043d\u044b\u0439 \u043f\u043e\u0434\u0445\u043e\u0434 \u043a \u0440\u0435\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0437\u0430\u0446\u0438\u0438 \u043e\u0431\u0440\u0430\u0437\u043e\u0432\u0430\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044c\u043d\u044b\u0445 \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0433\u0440\u0430\u043c\u043c \u043f\u0440\u0438 \u043f\u043e\u0434\u0433\u043e\u0442\u043e\u0432\u043a\u0435 \u0438\u043d\u0436\u0435\u043d\u0435\u0440\u043d\u044b\u0445 \u043a\u0430\u0434\u0440\u043e\u0432 The article discusses peculiarities of the customized approach, which takes into account the requirements of specific employers to the process and content of specialists\u2019 training. Since the final consumer of the educational service provided by tertiary educational organization is the employer who hired the graduate, it is necessary to focus on the specifics of a particular organization activity when training specialists. Customized training is based on the collaboration of the University and the partner organization-employer, which consists in coordinating and adjusting educational programs within the existing standards to form professionally significant skills of graduates demanded by the employer, and involves further employment of the graduate in this organization. In this case, the specified organization acts as an investor or co-investor in the training of a future specialist. The employer\u2019s participation in the educational process includes cooperation with the university not only in development of curricula and work programs of disciplines, but also in organization of seminars, conferences, in providing platforms and equipment for students to have their practice and to do their projects in real production conditions while solving actual professional problems. Customized training is one of the mechanisms to solve the problem of overabundance of specialists in some industries and a shortage of highly qualified personnel in others. ; \u0412 The goal of this paper is to fill the gap and analyze the state, efficiency and factors of the agricultural knowledge sharing, innovation and digitalization in Bulgaria at current stage of development. Analysis is based on 2019 expert assessment with 32 leading experts from research institutes of the Agricultural Academy, Bulgarian Academy of Sciences, agrarian and other universities, National Agricultural Advisory Service, and major professional associations of agricultural producers. The study has found out that AKIS of the country consists of diverse and numerous organizations, for which activities and complex relations have no sufficient official or other reliable information. The expert assessments in that study let us identify the state, and major achievements and challenges in development in of that complex system. The lack of data however, only partially can be compensated by experts\u2019 assessments of this type. It is also necessary to carry out in-depth and representative surveys of individual components and the AKIS as a whole. Furthermore, it is necessary to institutionalize and regulate collection of official statistical, report, etc. information for the state and efficiency of that important system. knowledge sharing; innovation; digitalization; agriculture; Management Journal of Integrated Marketing Communications and Digital Marketing 1(1) 1-17 Hrabrin Bachev"},{"id":"158db84154172d1c3b61d220a8cfb8300a2ceb5f7b12720fdc021b1d125c25be","content":"Curso Afiliado Black Funciona ? Ou seja, voc\u00ea fica perdido. Eu sei que voc\u00ea viu o Luciano Augusto prometendo muita coisa acerca do curso, e quer ter certeza se o Curso Afiliado Black funciona. Clique no link abaixo e garanta sua vaga ! obs : as vagas s\u00e3o limitadas => CLIQUE AQUI E FA\u00c7A SUA INSCRI\u00c7\u00c3O COM DESCONTO <= afiliado black; curso afiliado black  Gabi"},{"id":"e8b6255350068abb777203e5fa517f7a86dcc0ce08f8948be70575b9ceddb6b1","content":"Annual Company Reports\u2019 narratives migrate to the Web: A diachronic perspective Despite the dramatic innovation brought about in the field of corporate communication by the advent of the World Wide Web, when it comes to annual company reports (ACRs), companies seem to introduce few innovative digital elements in the drafting and formatting of the narrative sections. The present study, as the last step of a long-term research project, aimed at investigating this genre from a diachronic point of view by concentrating on the transformations that ACRs\u2019 corporate narratives undergo once they migrate to the Web. Two standpoints emerge: the first sees companies that are highly engaged in the digital environment take advantage of several digital tools at once, while the second proposes a slightly less technological approach whereby simple ACRs in pdf format are uploaded on the company website therefore lacking the most interactive functions. While radical changes in the presentation of ACRs\u2019 narratives between 2000 and 2018 cannot be traced, some companies have decided to deal with such narratives by reporting either the complete narrative or its synthesis. ; cinzia.giglioni@uniroma1.it ; Cinzia Giglioni holds a research and teaching position at the Department of Political Sciences, University of Rome \u201cLa Sapienza\u201d. She was a contract professor for several years in different universities in Italy, teaching both BA and first level master degree students. Her research interests span from second language acquisition to discourse analysis, especially in the context of LSP research. Her most recent contributions focus on the linguistic aspects of corporate and political communication. She has presented papers at several international conferences and symposia, and has published the results of her research in journals and edited volumes. Digitization of the media industry, convergence of the functions and tasks in the field of communicative professions, intensification of media influences and media effects caused the need for journalism education revision. The appeal to competency as a basic term of the theory of education made it possible to update that set of knowledge, skills, professional qualities and values that make up the basic model of the journalistic profession. According to Z. Weischenberg\u2019s classical model, journalism competency as a target function of journalism education has complex architectonics and integrates four components: professional competence, communication competence, special \/ industrial knowledge and social orientation. Each of the core competencies is transformed under the influence of new conditions of the profession realization, their relative importance changes. Thus, instrumental skills are changing under the influence of participatory journalism models. Participatory journalism requires a completely different content production algorithm. It requires the skills of information verification, interaction with amateur contributors and officials, involved in the process of solution of problems of different scales and directions, communication with an active audience, which is driven by an increased feedback factor in communication. At the same time, the knowledge segment of journalism competency becomes more important in connection with the emergence of a whole block of media-oriented disciplines: media psychology, media economics, media law, etc. The analytical component of the journalistic profession, caused by new information inquiries and the needs of the society, is increasing. The need for media marketing knowledge, which is gaining new sense and guidance as a result of the transition of the media to the digital platform, is being updated. Proactive competencies that allow journalists to continuously adapt to changes in the media industry also become a significant component of the competency model. ; \u0412 \u0446\u0435\u043d\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0435\u0439, \u0441\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0430\u0432\u043b\u044f\u044e\u0449\u0438\u0445 \u0431\u0430\u0437\u043e\u0432\u0443\u044e \u043c\u043e\u0434\u0435\u043b\u044c \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0441\u043a\u043e\u0439 \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0444\u0435\u0441\u0441\u0438\u0438. \u0421\u043e\u0433\u043b\u0430\u0441\u043d\u043e \u043a\u043b\u0430\u0441\u0441\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u043a\u043e\u0439 \u043c\u043e\u0434\u0435\u043b\u0438 \u0417. \u0412\u0430\u0439\u0448\u0435\u043d\u0431\u0435\u0440\u0433\u0430, \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0441\u043a\u0430\u044f \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0442\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u044c \u043a\u0430\u043a \u0446\u0435\u043b\u0435\u0432\u0430\u044f \u0444\u0443\u043d\u043a\u0446\u0438\u044f \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0441\u043a\u043e\u0433\u043e \u043e\u0431\u0440\u0430\u0437\u043e\u0432\u0430\u043d\u0438\u044f \u0438\u043c\u0435\u0435\u0442 \u0441\u043b\u043e\u0436\u043d\u0443\u044e \u0430\u0440\u0445\u0438\u0442\u0435\u043a\u0442\u043e\u043d\u0438\u043a\u0443 \u0438 \u0438\u043d\u0442\u0435\u0433\u0440\u0438\u0440\u0443\u0435\u0442 \u0447\u0435\u0442\u044b\u0440\u0435 \u0441\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0430\u0432\u043b\u044f\u044e\u0449\u0438\u0435: \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0444\u0435\u0441\u0441\u0438\u043e\u043d\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u0443\u044e \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0446\u0438\u044e, \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0438\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0438\u043e\u043d\u043d\u0443\u044e \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0446\u0438\u044e, \u0441\u043f\u0435\u0446\u0438\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u044b\u0435\/\u043e\u0442\u0440\u0430\u0441\u043b\u0435\u0432\u044b\u0435 \u0437\u043d\u0430\u043d\u0438\u044f \u0438 \u0441\u043e\u0446\u0438\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u0443\u044e \u043e\u0440\u0438\u0435\u043d\u0442\u0438\u0440\u043e\u0432\u0430\u043d\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u044c. \u041a\u0430\u0436\u0434\u0430\u044f \u0438\u0437 \u0441\u0442\u0435\u0440\u0436\u043d\u0435\u0432\u044b\u0445 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0446\u0438\u0439 \u043f\u043e\u0434 \u0432\u043b\u0438\u044f\u043d\u0438\u0435\u043c \u043d\u043e\u0432\u044b\u0445 \u0443\u0441\u043b\u043e\u0432\u0438\u0439 \u0440\u0435\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0437\u0430\u0446\u0438\u0438 \u0441\u043f\u0435\u0446\u0438\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0438 \u0442\u0440\u0430\u043d\u0441\u0444\u043e\u0440\u043c\u0438\u0440\u0443\u0435\u0442\u0441\u044f, \u043c\u0435\u043d\u044f\u0435\u0442\u0441\u044f \u0438\u0445 \u0443\u0434\u0435\u043b\u044c\u043d\u044b\u0439 \u0432\u0435\u0441. \u0422\u0430\u043a, \u0438\u043d\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0443\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0442\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u044b\u0435 \u043d\u0430\u0432\u044b\u043a\u0438 \u0438\u0437\u043c\u0435\u043d\u044f\u044e\u0442\u0441\u044f \u043f\u043e\u0434 \u0432\u043b\u0438\u044f\u043d\u0438\u0435\u043c \u043f\u0430\u0440\u0442\u0438\u0441\u0438\u043f\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0432\u043d\u044b\u0445 \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0441\u043a\u0438\u0445 \u043c\u043e\u0434\u0435\u043b\u0435\u0439. \u0416\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0438\u043a\u0430 \u0441\u043e\u0443\u0447\u0430\u0441\u0442\u0438\u044f \u0442\u0440\u0435\u0431\u0443\u0435\u0442 \u0441\u043e\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0448\u0435\u043d\u043d\u043e \u0438\u043d\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0430\u043b\u0433\u043e\u0440\u0438\u0442\u043c\u0430 \u043a\u043e\u043d\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0442\u043e\u043f\u0440\u043e\u0438\u0437\u0432\u043e\u0434\u0441\u0442\u0432\u0430. \u041e\u043d\u0430 \u043f\u0440\u0435\u0434\u0443\u0441\u043c\u0430\u0442\u0440\u0438\u0432\u0430\u0435\u0442 \u043d\u0430\u0432\u044b\u043a\u0438 \u0432\u0435\u0440\u0438\u0444\u0438\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0438\u0438 \u0438\u043d\u0444\u043e\u0440\u043c\u0430\u0446\u0438\u0438, \u0432\u0437\u0430\u0438\u043c\u043e\u0434\u0435\u0439\u0441\u0442\u0432\u0438\u044f \u0441 \u043a\u043e\u0440\u0440\u0435\u0441\u043f\u043e\u043d\u0434\u0435\u043d\u0442\u0430\u043c\u0438-\u043b\u044e\u0431\u0438\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044f\u043c\u0438 \u0438 \u0432\u043b\u0430\u0441\u0442\u044c\u0438\u043c\u0443\u0449\u0438\u043c\u0438, \u043a\u043e\u0442\u043e\u0440\u044b\u0435 \u043f\u0440\u0438\u0432\u043b\u0435\u043a\u0430\u044e\u0442\u0441\u044f \u043a \u0440\u0435\u0448\u0435\u043d\u0438\u044e \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0431\u043b\u0435\u043c \u0440\u0430\u0437\u043b\u0438\u0447\u043d\u043e\u0439 \u043c\u0430\u0441\u0448\u0442\u0430\u0431\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0438 \u0438 \u043d\u0430\u043f\u0440\u0430\u0432\u043b\u0435\u043d\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0438, \u043e\u0431\u0449\u0435\u043d\u0438\u044f \u0441 \u0430\u043a\u0442\u0438\u0432\u043d\u043e\u0439 \u0430\u0443\u0434\u0438\u0442\u043e\u0440\u0438\u0435\u0439, \u0447\u0442\u043e \u043e\u0431\u044a\u044f\u0441\u043d\u044f\u0435\u0442\u0441\u044f \u0443\u0441\u0438\u043b\u0435\u043d\u0438\u0435\u043c \u0444\u0430\u043a\u0442\u043e\u0440\u0430 \u043e\u0431\u0440\u0430\u0442\u043d\u043e\u0439 \u0441\u0432\u044f\u0437\u0438 \u0432 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0438\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0438\u0438. \u0412 \u0442\u043e \u0436\u0435 \u0432\u0440\u0435\u043c\u044f \u0431\u043e\u043b\u044c\u0448\u043e\u0439 \u0432\u0435\u0441 \u043f\u0440\u0438\u043e\u0431\u0440\u0435\u0442\u0430\u0435\u0442 \u0437\u043d\u0430\u043d\u0438\u0435\u0432\u044b\u0439 \u0441\u0435\u0433\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0442 \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0441\u043a\u043e\u0439 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0442\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0438 \u0432 \u0441\u0432\u044f\u0437\u0438 \u0441 \u0432\u043e\u0437\u043d\u0438\u043a\u043d\u043e\u0432\u0435\u043d\u0438\u0435\u043c \u0446\u0435\u043b\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0431\u043b\u043e\u043a\u0430 \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0430\u043e\u0440\u0438\u0435\u043d\u0442\u0438\u0440\u043e\u0432\u0430\u043d\u043d\u044b\u0445 \u0434\u0438\u0441\u0446\u0438\u043f\u043b\u0438\u043d: \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0430\u043f\u0441\u0438\u0445\u043e\u043b\u043e\u0433\u0438\u0438, \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0430\u044d\u043a\u043e\u043d\u043e\u043c\u0438\u043a\u0438, \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0430\u043f\u0440\u0430\u0432\u0430. \u0423\u0441\u0438\u043b\u0438\u0432\u0430\u0435\u0442\u0441\u044f \u0430\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0442\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u043a\u0430\u044f \u0441\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0430\u0432\u043b\u044f\u044e\u0449\u0430\u044f \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0441\u043a\u043e\u0439 \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0444\u0435\u0441\u0441\u0438\u0438, \u0432\u044b\u0437\u0432\u0430\u043d\u043d\u0430\u044f \u043d\u043e\u0432\u044b\u043c\u0438 \u0438\u043d\u0444\u043e\u0440\u043c\u0430\u0446\u0438\u043e\u043d\u043d\u044b\u043c\u0438 \u0437\u0430\u043f\u0440\u043e\u0441\u0430\u043c\u0438 \u0438 \u043f\u043e\u0442\u0440\u0435\u0431\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u044f\u043c\u0438 \u043e\u0431\u0449\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0432\u0430. \u0410\u043a\u0442\u0443\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0437\u0438\u0440\u0443\u0435\u0442\u0441\u044f \u043f\u043e\u0442\u0440\u0435\u0431\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u044c \u0432 \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0430\u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u044b\u0445 \u0437\u043d\u0430\u043d\u0438\u044f\u0445, \u043a\u043e\u0442\u043e\u0440\u044b\u0435 \u043f\u0440\u0438\u043e\u0431\u0440\u0435\u0442\u0430\u044e\u0442 \u043d\u043e\u0432\u044b\u0439 \u0441\u043c\u044b\u0441\u043b \u0438 \u043e\u0440\u0438\u0435\u043d\u0442\u0438\u0440\u044b \u0432\u0441\u043b\u0435\u0434\u0441\u0442\u0432\u0438\u0435 \u043f\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0445\u043e\u0434\u0430 \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0430 \u043d\u0430 \u0446\u0438\u0444\u0440\u043e\u0432\u0443\u044e \u043f\u043b\u0430\u0442\u0444\u043e\u0440\u043c\u0443. \u0412\u0435\u0441\u043e\u043c\u044b\u043c \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u043e\u043d\u0435\u043d\u0442\u043e\u043c \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0442\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u043d\u043e\u0439 \u043c\u043e\u0434\u0435\u043b\u0438 \u0441\u0442\u0430\u043d\u043e\u0432\u044f\u0442\u0441\u044f \u0442\u0430\u043a\u0436\u0435 \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0430\u043a\u0442\u0438\u0432\u043d\u044b\u0435 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0446\u0438\u0438, \u043f\u043e\u0437\u0432\u043e\u043b\u044f\u044e\u0449\u0438\u0435 \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0430\u043c \u043d\u0435\u043f\u0440\u0435\u0440\u044b\u0432\u043d\u043e \u0430\u0434\u0430\u043f\u0442\u0438\u0440\u043e\u0432\u0430\u0442\u044c\u0441\u044f \u043a \u0438\u0437\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0435\u043d\u0438\u044f\u043c \u0432 \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0430\u043e\u0442\u0440\u0430\u0441\u043b\u0438. ; \u0423 \u0441\u0442\u0430\u0442\u0442\u0456 \u043f\u0440\u0435\u0434\u0441\u0442\u0430\u0432\u043b\u0435\u043d\u043e \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0442\u043d\u0456\u0441\u043d\u0438\u0439 \u043f\u0456\u0434\u0445\u0456\u0434 \u0434\u043e \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0441\u0442\u0441\u044c\u043a\u043e\u0457 \u043e\u0441\u0432\u0456\u0442\u0438 \u0432 \u0443\u043c\u043e\u0432\u0430\u0445 \u0442\u0440\u0430\u043d\u0441\u0444\u043e\u0440\u043c\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0457 \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0441\u0442\u0441\u044c\u043a\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0444\u0430\u0445\u0443. \u0414\u0438\u0433\u0456\u0442\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0437\u0430\u0446\u0456\u044f \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0456\u0430\u0433\u0430\u043b\u0443\u0437\u0456, \u043a\u043e\u043d\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0433\u0435\u043d\u0446\u0456\u044f \u0444\u0443\u043d\u043a\u0446\u0456\u0439 \u0442\u0430 \u0437\u0430\u0432\u0434\u0430\u043d\u044c \u0443 \u0446\u0430\u0440\u0438\u043d\u0456 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0456\u043a\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0432\u043d\u0438\u0445 \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0444\u0435\u0441\u0456\u0439, \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0438\u043b\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044f \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0456\u0430\u0432\u043f\u043b\u0438\u0432\u0456\u0432 \u0442\u0430 \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0456\u0430\u0435\u0444\u0435\u043a\u0442\u0456\u0432 \u0441\u043f\u0440\u0438\u0447\u0438\u043d\u0438\u043b\u0438 \u043f\u043e\u0442\u0440\u0435\u0431\u0443 \u0440\u0435\u0432\u0456\u0437\u0456\u0457 \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0441\u0442\u0441\u044c\u043a\u043e\u0457 \u043e\u0441\u0432\u0456\u0442\u0438. \u0417\u0432\u0435\u0440\u043d\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044f \u0434\u043e \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0446\u0456\u0457 \u044f\u043a \u0434\u043e \u0437\u0430\u0441\u0430\u0434\u043d\u0438\u0447\u043e\u0433\u043e \u043f\u043e\u043d\u044f\u0442\u0442\u044f \u0442\u0435\u043e\u0440\u0456\u0457 \u043e\u0441\u0432\u0456\u0442\u0438 \u0434\u043e\u0437\u0432\u043e\u043b\u0438\u043b\u043e \u0430\u043a\u0442\u0443\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0437\u0443\u0432\u0430\u0442\u0438 \u0442\u043e\u0439 \u043d\u0430\u0431\u0456\u0440 \u0437\u043d\u0430\u043d\u044c, \u0432\u043c\u0456\u043d\u044c, \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0444\u0435\u0441\u0456\u0439\u043d\u0438\u0445 \u044f\u043a\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0435\u0439 \u0442\u0430 \u0446\u0456\u043d\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0435\u0439, \u0449\u043e \u0441\u043a\u043b\u0430\u0434\u0430\u044e\u0442\u044c \u0431\u0430\u0437\u043e\u0432\u0443 \u043c\u043e\u0434\u0435\u043b\u044c \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0441\u0442\u0441\u044c\u043a\u043e\u0457 \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0444\u0435\u0441\u0456\u0457. \u0412\u0456\u0434\u043f\u043e\u0432\u0456\u0434\u043d\u043e \u0434\u043e \u043a\u043b\u0430\u0441\u0438\u0447\u043d\u043e\u0457 \u043c\u043e\u0434\u0435\u043b\u0456 \u0417. \u0412\u0430\u0439\u0448\u0435\u043d\u0431\u0435\u0440\u0433\u0430,
